# <a name="sensitive-information-type-entity-definitions"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-104">敏感信息类型属性定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-104">Sensitive information type entity definitions</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-105">合规性中心中的数据丢失防护 (DLP) 包括许多可供您在 DLP 策略中使用的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-105">Data loss prevention (DLP) in the Compliance Center includes many sensitive information types that are ready for you to use in your DLP policies.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-106">本主题列出了所有这些敏感信息类型，并显示 DLP 策略在检测到每种类型时查找的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-106">This topic lists all of these sensitive information types and shows what a DLP policy looks for when it detects each type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-107">敏感信息类型通过正则表达式或函数可以识别的模式定义。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-107">A sensitive information type is defined by a pattern that can be identified by a regular expression or a function.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-108">此外，关键字和校验和等确凿的证据可用于识别敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-108">In addition, corroborative evidence such as keywords and checksums can be used to identify a sensitive information type.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-109">可信度和相似度也会在评估过程中使用。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-109">Confidence level and proximity are also used in the evaluation process.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-110">敏感信息类型需要以下订阅之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-110">Sensitive information types require one of these subscriptions:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-111">Microsoft 365 E3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-112">Microsoft 365 E5</span></span>

## <a name="aba-routing-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-113">ABA 传送号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-113">ABA routing number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-115">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-115">nine digits which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-117">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-117">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-118">以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-118">four digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-119">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-119">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-120">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-120">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-121">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-121">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-122">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-122">a digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-123">未格式化：以0、1、2、3、6、7或8开头的九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-123">Unformatted: nine consecutive digits beginning with 0, 1, 2, 3, 6, 7, or 8</span></span> 

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-124">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-124">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-125">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-125">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-126">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-126">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-127">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-127">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-128">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-128">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-129">找到 Keyword_ABA_Routing 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-129">A keyword from Keyword_ABA_Routing is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-130">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-130">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-131">函数 Func_aba_routing 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-131">The function Func_aba_routing finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- ABA Routing Number -->
    <Entity id="cb353f78-2b72-4c3c-8827-92ebe4f69fdf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ABA_Routing" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_aba_routing" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="argentina-national-identity-dni-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-149">阿根廷国家标识 (DNI) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-149">Argentina national identity (DNI) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-151">包含或不带句点的8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-151">Eight digits with or without periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-153">八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-153">Eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-154">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-155">可选期间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-155">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-156">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-156">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-157">可选期间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-157">an optional period</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-158">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-158">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-163">正则表达式 Regex_argentina_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-163">The regular expression Regex_argentina_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-164">找到 Keyword_argentina_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-164">A keyword from Keyword_argentina_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Argentina National Identity (DNI) Number -->
<Entity id="eefbb00e-8282-433c-8620-8f1da3bffdb2" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_argentina_national_id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_argentina_national_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-170">dni</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-170">dni</span></span>

## <a name="australia-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-176">澳大利亚银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-176">Australia bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-177">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-177">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-178">具有或不包含银行状态分支编号的6到10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-178">six to ten digits with or without a bank state branch number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-179">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-179">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-180">帐号是6到10位数字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-180">Account number is six to ten digits.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-181">澳大利亚银行州级分部编号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-181">Australia bank state branch number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-182">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-182">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-183">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-183">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-184">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-184">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-185">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-185">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-186">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-186">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-187">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-187">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-188">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-188">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-189">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-189">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-190">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-190">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-191">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-191">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-192">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-192">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-193">正则表达式 Regex_australia_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-193">The regular expression Regex_australia_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-194">找到 Keyword_australia_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-194">A keyword from Keyword_australia_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="74a54de9-2a30-4aa0-a8aa-3d9327fc07c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number_bsb" />
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_bank_account_number" />
  </Pattern>
 </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-business-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-210">澳大利亚商业电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-210">Australia business number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-211">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-211">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-212">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-212">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-213">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-213">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-214">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-214">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-215">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-215">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-216">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-216">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>


### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-217">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-217">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-218">11个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-218">11 digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-219">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-219">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-220">11个带可选分隔符的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-220">11 digits with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-221">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-221">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-222">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-222">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-223">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-223">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-224">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-224">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-225">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-225">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-226">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-226">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-227">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-227">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-228">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-228">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-229">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-229">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-230">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-230">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-231">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-231">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-232">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-232">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-233">找到 Keywords_australian_business_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-233">A keyword from Keywords_australian_business_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-234">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-234">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-235">函数 Func_australian_business_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-235">The function Func_australian_business_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Business Number -->
      <Entity id="76e83b3b-01ee-4530-aced-e667a6609f49" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_business_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-company-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-245">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-245">Australia company number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-246">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-246">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-247">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-247">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-248">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-248">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-249">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-249">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-250">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-250">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-251">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-251">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-253">9个带分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-253">nine digits with delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-255">九位数带分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-255">nine digits with delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-256">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-256">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-257">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-257">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-258">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-258">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-259">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-259">a space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-260">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-260">three digits</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-261">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-261">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-262">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-262">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-263">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-263">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-264">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-264">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-265">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-265">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-266">找到 Keyword_Australian_Company_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-266">A keyword from Keyword_Australian_Company_Number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-267">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-267">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-268">函数 Func_Australian_Company_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-268">The function Func_Australian_Company_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Australia Company Number -->
      <Entity id="b1fba4f7-7b3e-4bb9-8f9a-9366df604dbb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Australian_Company_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-274">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-274">australia company number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-275">澳大利亚公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-275">australian company no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-276">澳大利亚公司编号#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-276">australian company no#</span></span>

## <a name="australia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-278">澳大利亚驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-278">Australia driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-279">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-279">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-280">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-280">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-281">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-281">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-282">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-282">nine letters and digits:</span></span> 

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-283">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-283">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-284">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-284">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-285">五个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-285">five digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-286">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-286">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-287">一到两个可选字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-287">one to two optional letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-288">4到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-288">four to nine digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-289">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-289">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-290">9个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-290">nine digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-291">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-291">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-292">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-292">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-293">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-293">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-294">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-294">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-295">正则表达式 Regex_australia_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-295">The regular expression Regex_australia_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-296">找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-296">A keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-297">未找到 Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-297">No keyword from Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Drivers License Number -->
<Entity id="1cbbc8f5-9216-4392-9eb5-5ac2298d1356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
   <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_drivers_license_number_exclusions" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="australia-medical-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-397">澳大利亚医疗帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-397">Australia medical account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-398">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-398">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-399">10-11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-399">10-11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-400">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-400">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-401">10-11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-401">10-11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-402">第一个数字在范围2-6</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-402">first digit is in the range 2-6</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-403">第九个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-403">ninth digit is a check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-404">第十位数字是问题位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-404">tenth digit is the issue digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-405">第十位数字 (可选) 是单个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-405">eleventh digit (optional) is the individual number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-406">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-406">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-407">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-407">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-408">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-408">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-409">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-409">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-410">函数 Func_australian_medical_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-410">The function Func_australian_medical_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-411">找到 Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-411">A keyword from Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-412">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-412">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
  <!-- Australia Medical Account Number -->
<Entity id="104a99a0-3d3b-4542-a40d-ab0b9e1efe63" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_medical_account_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Medical_Account_Number"/>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-417">mortgage account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-417">mortgage account</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-418">bank payments</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-418">bank payments</span></span>

## <a name="australia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-424">澳大利亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-424">Australia passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-425">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-425">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-426">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-426">A letter followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-427">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-427">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-428">一个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-428">A letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-429">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-429">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-430">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-430">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-431">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-431">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-432">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-432">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-433">正则表达式 Regex_australia_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-433">The regular expression Regex_australia_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-434">找到 Keyword_passport 或 Keyword_australia_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-434">A keyword from Keyword_passport or Keyword_australia_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Australia Passport Number -->
<Entity id="29869db6-602d-4853-ab93-3484f905df50" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_australia_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_australia_passport_number" />
        </Any>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>   
```

## <a name="australia-tax-file-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-468">澳大利亚税务文件编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-468">Australia tax file number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-469">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-469">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-470">8到9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-470">eight to nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-471">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-471">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-472">通常显示空格的八到九个数字，如下所示：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-472">eight to nine digits typically presented with spaces as follows:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-473">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-473">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-474">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-474">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-475">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-475">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-476">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-476">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-477">两到三个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-477">two to three digits where the last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-478">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-478">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-479">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-479">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-480">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-480">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-481">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-481">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-482">函数 Func_australian_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-482">The function Func_australian_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-483">未找到 Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number 或 Keyword_number_exclusions 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-483">No keyword from Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number or Keyword_number_exclusions is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-484">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-484">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
   <!-- Australia Tax File Number -->
    <Entity id="e29bc95f-ff70-4a37-aa01-04d17360a4c5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_australian_tax_file_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_Australia_Tax_File_Number" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-487">australian business number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-487">australian business number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-489">medicare levy</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-489">medicare levy</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-490">portfolio number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-490">portfolio number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-491">service veterans</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-491">service veterans</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-492">withholding tax</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-492">withholding tax</span></span>

## <a name="austria-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-496">奥地利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-496">Austria driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-497">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-497">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-498">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-498">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-499">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-499">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-500">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-500">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-501">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-501">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-502">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-502">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-503">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-503">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-504">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-504">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-505">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-505">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-506">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-506">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-507">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-507">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="682f18ce-44eb-482b-8198-2bcb96a0761e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-634">奥地利身份卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-634">Austria identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-635">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-635">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-636">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-636">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-637">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-637">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-638">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-638">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-639">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-639">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-640">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-640">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-641">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-641">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-642">字母、数字和特殊字符的24个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-642">A 24-character combination of letters, digits, and special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-643">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-643">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-644">24个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-644">24 characters:</span></span>
  
-  <span data-ttu-id="68240-645">22个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠或加号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-645">22 letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, or plus signs</span></span> 
    
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-646">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 、数字、反斜杠、正斜杠、加号或等号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-646">two letters (not case-sensitive), digits, backslashes, forward slashes, plus signs, or equal signs</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-647">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-648">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-648">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-649">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-650">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-650">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-651">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-651">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-652">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-652">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
   
```xml
      <!-- Austria Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="5ec06c3b-007e-4820-8343-7ff73b889735" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-653">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-653">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-654">Keywords_austria_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-655">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-655">identity number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-656">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-656">national id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-657">personalausweis republik österreich</span></span>

## <a name="austria-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-658">奥地利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-658">Austria passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-659">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号码 sensitiveinformation 类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-659">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitiveinformation type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-660">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-660">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-661">一个字母后跟一个可选空格和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-661">One letter followed by an optional space and seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-662">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-662">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-663">一个字母、七个数字和一个空格的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-663">A combination of one letter, seven digits, and one space:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-664">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-664">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-665">一个空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-665">one space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-666">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-666">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-667">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-667">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-668">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-668">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-669">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-669">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-670">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-670">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-671">正则表达式  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-671">The regular expression  `Regex_austria_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-672">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-672">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-693">奥地利社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-693">Austria social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-694">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-694">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-695">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-695">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-696">以指定格式表示的10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-696">10 digits in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-697">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-697">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-698">10 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-698">10 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-699">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-699">three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-700">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-700">one check digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-701">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-701">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-702">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-702">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-703">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-703">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-704">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-704">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-705">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-705">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-706">函数 "Func_austria_eu_</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-706">The function  \`Func_austria_eu_</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-707">_or_equivalent "找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-707">_or_equivalent\` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-708">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-708">a keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-709">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-709">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-710">函数  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-710">The function  `Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-726">奥地利税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-726">Austria tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-728">9个数字，带可选连字符和正斜线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-728">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-730">9个带可选连字符和正斜线的数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-730">nine digits with optional hyphen and forward slash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-731">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-731">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-732">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-733">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-733">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-734">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-734">a forward slash (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-735">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-735">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-736">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-736">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-737">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-737">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-738">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-738">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-739">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-739">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-740">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-740">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-741">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-741">A keyword from  `Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-742">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-742">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-743">函数  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-743">The function  `Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Austria Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="4fd58d22-af28-4451-b18a-6f722430a56d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_austria_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="austria-value-added-tax"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-766">奥地利增值税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-766">Austria value added tax</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-767">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-767">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-768">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-768">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-769">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-769">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-770">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-770">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-771">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-771">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-772">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-772">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-773">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-773">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-774">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-774">11-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-775">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-775">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-776">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-776">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-777">A 或 a</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-777">A or a</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-778">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-778">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-779">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-779">Optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-780">U 或 u</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-780">U or u</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-781">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-781">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-782">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-782">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-783">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-783">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-784">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-784">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-785">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-785">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-786">一个或两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-786">one or two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-787">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-787">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-788">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-788">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-789">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-789">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-790">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-790">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-791">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-791">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-792">找到 Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-792">A keyword from Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-793">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-793">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-794">函数 Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-794">The function Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Austria Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="b6a3eda2-c56c-4b69-a5f7-dca34db00f48" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_Austria_Value_Added_Tax" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-documentdb-auth-key"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-812">Azure DocumentDB 身份验证密钥</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-812">Azure DocumentDB auth key</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-813">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-813">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-814">字符串 "DocumentDb"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-814">The string "DocumentDb" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-815">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-815">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-816">字符串 "DocumentDb"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-816">The string "DocumentDb"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-817">介于3-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-817">Any combination of between 3-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-818">大于符号 ( # A0) 、等号 (=) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-818">A greater than symbol (>), an equal sign (=), a quotation mark ("), or an apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-819">86小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-819">Any combination of 86 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-820">两个等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-820">Two equal signs (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-821">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-821">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-822">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-822">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-823">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-823">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-824">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-824">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-825">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-825">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-826">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-826">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Azure Document DB Auth Key -->
<Entity id="0f587d92-eb28-44a9-bd1c-90f2892b47aa" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureDocumentDBAuthKey" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
          </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iaas-database-connection-string-and-azure-sql-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-841">Azure IAAS 数据库连接字符串和 Azure SQL 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-841">Azure IAAS database connection string and Azure SQL connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-842">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-842">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-843">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-843">The string "Server", "server", or "data source" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-844">com "或" cloudapp "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-844">com" or "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-845">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-845">net" or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-846">net "和字符串" Password "或" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-846">net", and the string "Password" or "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-847">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-847">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-848">字符串 "Server"、"server" 或 "data source"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-848">the string "Server", "server", or "data source"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-849">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-849">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-850">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-850">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-851">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-851">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-852">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-852">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-853">字符串 "cloudapp"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-853">The string "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-854">com "，" cloudapp。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-854">com", "cloudapp.azure.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-855">net "或" database。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-855">net", or "database.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-856">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-856">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-857">介于1-300 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-857">any combination of between 1-300 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-858">字符串 "Password"、"password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-858">the string "Password", "password", or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-859">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-859">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-860">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-860">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-861">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-861">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-862">一个或多个不是分号的字符 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-862">one or more characters that is not a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-863">分号 (; ) 、引号 ( ") 或撇号 ( ' ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-863">a semicolon (;), quotation mark ("), or apostrophe (')</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-864">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-864">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-865">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-865">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-866">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-866">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-867">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-867">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-868">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-868">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-869">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-869">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IAAS Database Connection String and Azure SQL Connection String-->
<Entity id="ce1a126d-186f-4700-8c0c-486157b953fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-iot-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-884">Azure IoT 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-884">Azure IoT connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-885">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-885">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-886">字符串 "HostName"，后跟下面模式中所示的字符和字符串，包括字符串 "azure 设备"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-886">The string "HostName" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the strings "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-887">net "和" SharedAccessKey "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-887">net" and "SharedAccessKey".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-888">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-888">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-889">字符串 "HostName"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-889">the string "HostName"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-890">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-890">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-891">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-891">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-892">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-892">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-893">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-893">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-894">字符串 "azure 设备。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-894">the string "azure-devices.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-895">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-895">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-896">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-896">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-897">字符串 "SharedAccessKey"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-897">the string "SharedAccessKey"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-898">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-898">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-899">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-899">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-900">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-900">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-901">43小写或大写字母、数字、正斜线 (/) 或加号 (+) 的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-901">any combination of 43 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-902">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-902">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-903">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-903">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-904">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-904">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-905">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-905">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-906">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-906">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-907">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-907">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-908">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-908">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure IoT Connection String-->
<Entity id="0b34bec3-d5d6-4974-b7b0-dcdb5c90c29d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">

        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureIoTConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-924">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-925">字符串 "userpwd ="，后跟一个字母数字字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-925">The string "userpwd=" followed by an alphanumeric string.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-926">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-926">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-927">字符串 "userpwd ="</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-927">the string "userpwd="</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-928">任何60小写字母或数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-928">any combination of 60 lowercase letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-929">引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-929">a quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-934">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-934">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-935">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-935">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
<!--Azure Publish Setting Password-->
<Entity id="75f4cc8a-a68e-49e5-89ce-fa8f03d286a5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
       <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzurePublishSettingPasswords" />
       <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
           <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
       </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="azure-redis-cache-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-950">Azure Redis 缓存连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-950">Azure Redis cache connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-951">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-951">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-952">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-952">The string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-953">net "，后跟下面的模式中所述的字符和字符串，包括字符串" password "或" pwd "。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-953">net" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below, including the string "password" or "pwd".</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-954">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-955">字符串 "redis"。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-955">the string "redis.cache.windows.</span></span><!--no-hyperlink--><span data-ttu-id="68240-956">netmeeting</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-956">net"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-957">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-957">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-958">字符串 "password" 或 "pwd"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-958">the string "password" or "pwd"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-959">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-959">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-960">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-960">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-961">零到两个空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-961">zero to two whitespace characters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-962">43个字符的任意组合，这些字符为小写字母、数字、数字、正斜杠 (/) 或加号 (+) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-962">any combination of 43 characters that are lower- or uppercase letters, digits, forward slash (/), or plus sign (+)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-963">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-963">an equal sign (=)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-964">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-964">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-965">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-965">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-966">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-966">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-967">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-967">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-968">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-968">The regular expression CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern..</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-969">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-969">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Azure Redis Cache Connection String-->
<Entity id="095a7e6c-efd8-46d5-af7b-5298d53a49fc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_AzureRedisCacheConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
