## <a name="canada-social-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2064">加拿大社会保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2064">Canada social insurance number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2065">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2065">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2066">9个数字，带可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2066">nine digits with optional hyphens or spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2067">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2067">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2068">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2068">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2069">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2069">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2070">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2070">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2071">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2071">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2072">连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2072">a hyphen or space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2073">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2073">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2074">未格式化：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2074">Unformatted: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2075">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2075">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2076">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2076">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2077">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2077">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2078">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2078">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2079">函数 Func_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2079">The function Func_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2080">至少两个以下任意组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2080">At least two of any combination of the following:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2081">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2081">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2082">找到 Keyword_sin_collaborative 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2082">A keyword from Keyword_sin_collaborative is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2083">函数 Func_eu_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2083">The function Func_eu_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2084">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2084">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2085">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2085">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2086">函数 Func_unformatted_canadian_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2086">The function Func_unformatted_canadian_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2087">找到 Keyword_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2087">A keyword from Keyword_sin is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2088">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2088">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Canada Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="a2f29c85-ecb8-4514-a610-364790c0773e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_canadian_sin" />
        <Any minMatches="2">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sin_collaborative" />
          <Match idRef="Func_eu_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_canadian_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_sin" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="chile-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2113">智利标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2113">Chile identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2114">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2114">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2115">七到八个数字加上分隔符一个校验位或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2115">seven to eight digits plus delimiters a check digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2116">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2116">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2117">七到八个数字加分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2117">seven to eight digits plus delimiters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2118">一到两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2118">one to two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2119">可选期间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2119">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2120">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2120">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2121">可选期间</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2121">an optional period</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2122">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2122">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2123">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2123">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2124">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 这是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2124">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2125">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2125">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2126">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2126">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2127">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2127">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2128">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2128">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2129">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2129">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2130">找到 Keyword_chile_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2130">A keyword from Keyword_chile_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2131">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2131">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2132">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2132">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2133">函数 Func_chile_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2133">The function Func_chile_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2134">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2134">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Chile Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="4e979794-49a0-407e-a0b9-2c536937b925" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_chile_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="china-resident-identity-card-prc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2171">中国居民身份卡片 (中国) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2171">China resident identity card (PRC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2172">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2172">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2173">18 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2173">18 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2174">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2174">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2175">18 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2175">18 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2176">6个数字，这是一个地址代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2176">six digits which are an address code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2177">8位数，形式为 YYYYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2177">eight digits in the form YYYYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2178">三个数字，这是一个订单代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2178">three digits which are an order code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2179">一个数字，是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2179">one digit which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2180">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2180">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2181">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2181">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2182">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2182">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2183">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2183">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2184">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2184">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2185">找到 Keyword_china_resident_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2185">A keyword from Keyword_china_resident_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2186">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2186">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2187">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2187">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2188">函数 Func_china_resident_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2188">The function Func_china_resident_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2189">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2189">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- China Resident Identity Card (PRC) Number -->
<Entity id="c92daa86-2d16-4871-901f-816b3f554fc1" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_china_resident_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2190">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2190">Keywords</span></span>

### <a name="keyword_china_resident_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2191">Keyword_china_resident_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2192">Resident Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2192">Resident Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2193">台湾</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2193">PRC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2194">National Identification Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2194">National Identification Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2195">身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2195">身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2196">居民 身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2196">居民 身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2197">居民身份证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2197">居民身份证</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2198">鉴定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2198">鉴定</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2199">身分證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2199">身分證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2200">居民身份證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2200">居民 身份證</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2201">鑑定</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2201">鑑定</span></span> 

   
## <a name="credit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2202">信用卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2202">Credit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2203">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2203">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2204">14到16个数字，可以设置格式或无格式 (dddddddddddddddd) 且必须通过 Luhn 测试。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2204">14 to 16 digits which can be formatted or unformatted (dddddddddddddddd) and which must pass the Luhn test.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2205">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2205">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2206">非常复杂且强大的模式，检测到来自世界各地所有重要品牌的卡，包括 Visa、万事达卡、发现卡、JCB卡、美国运通卡、礼品卡以及大莱卡。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2206">Very complex and robust pattern that detects cards from all major brands worldwide, including Visa, MasterCard, Discover Card, JCB, American Express, gift cards, and diner cards.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2207">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2207">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2208">是，Luhn 校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2208">Yes, the Luhn checksum</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2209">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2209">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2210">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2210">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2211">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2211">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2212">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2212">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2213">找到 Keyword_cc_verification 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2213">A keyword from Keyword_cc_verification is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2214">找到 Keyword_cc_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2214">A keyword from Keyword_cc_name is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-2215">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2215">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2216">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2216">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2217">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2218">函数 Func_credit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2218">The function Func_credit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2219">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2219">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Credit Card Number -->
<Entity id="50842eb7-edc8-4019-85dd-5a5c1f2bb085" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_verification" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_cc_name" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_credit_card" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2222">card verification</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2222">card verification</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2224">cvn</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2224">cvn</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2229">security code</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2229">security code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2230">security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2230">security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2231">security no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2231">security no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2232">issue number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2232">issue number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2233">issue no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2233">issue no</span></span>

## <a name="croatia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2479">克罗地亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2479">Croatia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2480">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2480">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2481">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2481">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2482">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2482">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2483">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2483">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2484">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2484">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2485">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2485">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2486">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2486">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2487">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2487">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2489">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2489">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2490">找到或中的关键字 `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2490">A keyword from `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="005b3ef1-47dd-4e68-bb02-c6db484d00f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2614">克罗地亚 identity 卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2614">Croatia identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2615">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区标识的敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2615">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identification Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2616">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2616">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2617">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2617">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2618">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2618">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2619">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2619">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2620">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2620">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2621">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2621">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2622">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2622">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2623">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2623">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2624">函数 Func_croatia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2624">The function Func_croatia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2625">找到 Keyword_croatia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2625">A keyword from Keyword_croatia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Croatia Identity Card Number-->
<Entity id="ff12f884-c20a-4189-b185-34c8e7258d47" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_croatia_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2656">克罗地亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2656">Croatia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2657">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2657">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2658">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2658">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2659">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2659">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2660">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2660">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2661">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2661">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2662">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2662">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2663">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2663">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2664">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2664">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2665">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2665">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2666">正则表达式  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2666">The regular expression  `Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2667">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2667">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-personal-identification-oib-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2685">克罗地亚个人标识 (OIB) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2685">Croatia personal identification (OIB) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2686">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2687">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2687">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2689">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2689">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2690">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2690">ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2691">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2691">final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2693">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2693">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2695">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2696">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2696">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2697">找到 Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2697">A keyword from Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2698">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2698">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2700">函数 Func_croatia_oib_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2700">The function Func_croatia_oib_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2701">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2701">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Croatia Personal Identification (OIB) Number -->
      <Entity id="31983b6d-db95-4eb2-a630-b44bd091968d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_oib_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="croatia-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2732">克罗地亚社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2732">Croatia social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2733">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2733">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2734">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2734">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2735">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2735">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2736">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2736">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2737">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2737">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2738">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2738">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2739">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2739">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2740">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2740">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2741">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2741">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2742">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2742">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2743">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2743">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2744">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2744">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2745">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2745">A keyword from  `Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2746">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2746">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2747">函数  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2747">The function  `Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2748">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2748">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2749">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2749">Keywords_croatia_eu_ssn_or_equivalent</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2750">个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2750">personal identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2751">主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2751">master citizen number</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2764">塞浦路斯驱动程序许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2764">Cyprus drivers license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2765">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2767">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2767">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2769">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2769">12 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2770">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2770">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2771">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2771">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2772">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2772">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2773">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2773">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2774">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2774">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2775">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2775">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="356fa104-f9ac-4aff-a0e4-2e6e65ea06c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2900">塞浦路斯标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2900">Cyprus identity card</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2901">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2901">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2902">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2902">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2903">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2903">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2904">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2904">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2905">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2905">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2906">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2906">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2907">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2907">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2908">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2908">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2909">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2909">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2910">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2910">ten digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2911">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2911">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2912">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2912">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2913">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2913">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2914">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2914">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2915">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2915">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2916">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2916">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml 
      <!-- Cyprus Identity Card -->
      <Entity id="3ba8afe5-7a6c-4929-8247-0001b6878438" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2918">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2918">Keywords_cyprus_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

## <a name="cyprus-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2925">塞浦路斯护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2925">Cyprus passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2926">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2926">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2927">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2927">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2928">一个字母后跟6-8 个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2928">one letter followed by 6-8 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2929">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2929">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2930">一个字母后跟6到8个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2930">one letter followed by six to eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2931">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2931">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2932">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2932">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2933">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2933">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2934">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2934">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2935">正则表达式  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2935">The regular expression  `Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2936">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2936">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="cyprus-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2962">塞浦路斯税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2962">Cyprus tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2963">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2963">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2964">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2964">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2965">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2965">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2966">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2966">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2967">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2967">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2968">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2968">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2969">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2969">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2970">指定模式中的八个数字和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2970">eight digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2971">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2971">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2972">八个数字和一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2972">eight digits and one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2973">"0" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2973">a "0" or "9"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2974">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2974">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2975">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2975">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2976">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2976">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2977">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2977">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2978">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2978">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-2979">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2979">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2980">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2980">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2981">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2981">A keyword from  `Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-2982">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2982">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2983">函数  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2983">The function  `Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Cyprus Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="40e64bd9-55f3-4a09-9bd6-1db18dced9dd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2984">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2984">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-2985">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2985">Keywords_cyprus_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2986">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2986">tax id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2988">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2988">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2989">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2989">tax identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2990">免税#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2990">tax no#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2991">免税</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2991">tax no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2992">税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2992">tax number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2993">税务登记编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2993">tax registration number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-2994">taxid#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-2994">taxid#</span></span>

## <a name="czech-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3011">捷克语驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3011">Czech driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3012">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3012">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3013">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3013">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3014">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3014">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3015">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3015">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3016">八个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3016">eight letters and digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3017">字母 "E" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3017">letter 'E' (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3018">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3018">a letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3019">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3019">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3020">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3020">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3021">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3021">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3022">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3022">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3023">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3023">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3024">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3024">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3025">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3025">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3026">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3026">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

```xml
      <Entity id="86b40d3b-d8ea-4c36-aab0-ef9416a6769c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="czech-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3152">捷克语护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3152">Czech passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3153">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3153">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3154">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3154">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3155">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3155">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3156">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3156">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3157">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3157">eight digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3158">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3158">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3159">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3159">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3160">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3160">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3161">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3161">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3162">正则表达式  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3162">The regular expression  `Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3163">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3163">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-personal-identity-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3182">捷克个人识别码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3182">Czech personal identity number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3184">9个数字，带可选的正斜杠 (旧格式) 10 个数字，可选的正斜杠 (新格式) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3184">nine digits with optional forward slash (old format) ten digits with optional forward slash (new format)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3186"> (旧格式) 的9个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3186">nine digits (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3187">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3187">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3188">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3188">an optional forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3189">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3189">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3190">10个数字 (新格式) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3190">ten digits (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3191">代表出生日期的六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3191">six digits that represent date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3192">可选的正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3192">an optional forward slash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3193">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3193">four digits where last digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3194">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3194">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3195">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3195">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3196">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3196">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3197">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3197">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3198">函数 Func_czech_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3198">The function Func_czech_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3199">找到 Keyword_czech_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3199">A keyword from Keyword_czech_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3200">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3200">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3201">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3201">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3202">函数 Func_czech_id_card_new_format 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3202">The function Func_czech_id_card_new_format finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3203">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3203">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <!-- Czech Personal Identity Number -->
      <Entity id="60c0725a-4eb6-455b-9dda-05d8a7396497" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_czech_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3000.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
            <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_id_card_new_format" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="czech-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3250">捷克社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3250">Czech social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3251">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3251">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3252">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3252">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3253">指定模式中的10个数字和一个反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3253">ten digits and a backslash in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3254">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3254">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3255">10个数字和一个反斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3255">ten digits and a backslash:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3256">与出生日期对应的6个数字 (YYMMDD) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3256">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD):</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3257">反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3257">a backslash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3258">与一个序列号相对应的三个数字，用于分隔出生于同一日期的人员</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3258">three digits that correspond to a serial number that separates persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3259">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3259">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3260">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3260">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3261">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3261">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3262">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3262">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3263">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3263">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3264">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3264">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3265">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3265">A keyword from  `Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3266">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3266">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3267">函数  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3267">The function  `Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_czech_republic_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3283">丹麦驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3283">Denmark driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3284">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3284">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3285">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3285">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3286">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3286">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3287">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3287">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3288">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3288">eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3289">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3289">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3290">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3290">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3291">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3291">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3292">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3292">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3293">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3293">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3294">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3294">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Denmark Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="98a95812-6203-451a-a220-d39870ebef0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3418">丹麦护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3418">Denmark passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3419">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3420">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3421">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3421">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3422">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3423">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3423">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3424">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3425">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3426">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3427">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3428">正则表达式  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3428">The regular expression  `Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3429">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3429">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3446">丹麦个人身份号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3446">Denmark personal identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3447">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3447">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3448">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3448">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3449">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3449">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3450">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3450">ten digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3451">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3451">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3452">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3452">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3453">四个数字，其中最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3453">four digits where the final digit is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3454">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3455">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3456">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3457">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3458">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3458">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3459">找到 Keyword_denmark_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3459">A keyword from Keyword_denmark_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3460">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3460">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3461">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3461">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3462">正则表达式 Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3462">The regular expression Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3463">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3463">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <!-- Denmark Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="6c4f2fef-56e1-4c00-8093-88d7a01cf460" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_denmark_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="denmark-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3535">丹麦社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3535">Denmark social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3536">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3536">This sensitive information type entity is only available the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3537">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3537">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3538">指定模式中的10个数字和一个连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3538">ten digits and a hyphen in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3539">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3539">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3540">10个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3540">ten digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3541">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3541">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3542">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3542">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3543">与序列号对应的四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3543">four digits that correspond to a sequence number</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3545">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3545">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3547">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3548">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3548">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3549">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3549">A keyword from  `Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3550">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3550">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3551">函数  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3551">The function  `Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_denmark_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3556">social security number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3556">social security number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3557">nationalnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3557">nationalnumber#</span></span>
