## <a name="drug-enforcement-agency-dea-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3565">药品实施代理 (DEA) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3565">Drug Enforcement Agency (DEA) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3566">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3566">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3567">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3567">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3568">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3568">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3569">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3569">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3570">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 这组可能的字母： abcdefghjklmnprstux，这是注册人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3570">one letter (not case sensitive) from this set of possible letters: abcdefghjklmnprstux, which is a registrant code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3571">一个字母 (不区分大小写) （注册人姓氏或数字 "9" 的第一个字母）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3571">one letter (not case sensitive), which is the first letter of the registrant's last name or digit '9'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3572">七位数字，最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3572">seven digits, the last of which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3573">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3573">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3574">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3574">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3575">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3575">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3576">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3576">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3577">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3577">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3578">找到了 from 关键字 `Keyword_dea_number`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3578">A keyword from `Keyword_dea_number` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3579">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3579">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3580">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3580">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3581">函数 Func_dea_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3581">The function Func_dea_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3582">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3582">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- DEA Number -->
    <Entity id="9a5445ad-406e-43eb-8bd7-cac17ab6d0e4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
      </Pattern>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.1207.000" maxEngineVersion="15.20.3134.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
      <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3135.000">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_dea_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_dea_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Version>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3583">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3583">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_dea_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3584">Keyword_dea_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3585">dea</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3585">dea</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3586">dea#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3586">dea#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3587">药物实施管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3587">drug enforcement administration</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3588">药品实施代理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3588">drug enforcement agency</span></span>


## <a name="estonia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3589">爱沙尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3589">Estonia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3590">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3590">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3591">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3591">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3592">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3592">two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3593">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3593">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3594">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3594">two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3595">字母 "ET" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3595">the letters "ET" (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3596">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3596">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3597">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3597">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3598">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3598">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3599">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3599">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3600">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3600">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3601">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3601">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3602">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3602">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="51da8171-da70-4cc1-9d65-055a59ca4f83" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3729">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3729">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3730">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3730">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3731">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3731">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3732">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3732">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3733">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3733">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3734">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3734">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3735">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3735">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3736">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3736">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3737">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3737">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3738">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3738">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3739">一种数字，对应于性别和出生世纪 (奇数号码男，甚至是女号码，等等。1-2：19世纪;3-4：20世纪;5-6：21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3739">one digit that corresponds to sex and century of birth (odd number male, even number female; 1-2: 19th century; 3-4: 20th century; 5-6: 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3740">6位数字，对应于出生日期 (YYMMDD) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3740">six digits that correspond to date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3741">三个数字，对应于将出生在同一日期的人员组成的序列号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3741">three digits that correspond to a serial number separating persons born on the same date</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3742">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3742">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3743">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3743">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3744">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3744">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3745">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3745">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3746">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3746">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3747">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3747">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3748">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3748">A keyword from  `Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3749">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3749">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3750">函数  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3750">The function  `Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Estonia Personal Identification Code -->
      <Entity id="bfb26de6-dad5-4d48-ab72-4789cdd0654c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_estonia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="estonia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3783">爱沙尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3783">Estonia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-3784">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3784">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3785">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3785">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3786">一个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3786">one letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3787">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3787">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3788">一个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3788">one letter followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3789">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3789">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3790">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3790">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3791">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3791">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3792">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3792">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3793">正则表达式  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3793">The regular expression  `Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3794">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3794">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_estonia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3808">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document 无 dokumendi nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3808">eesti kodaniku pass passi number passinumbrid document number document no dokumendi nr</span></span>

## <a name="eu-debit-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3809">EU 借记卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3809">EU debit card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3810">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3810">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3811">16 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3811">16 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3812">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3812">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3813">非常复杂且强大的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3813">Very complex and robust pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3814">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3814">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3815">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3815">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3816">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3816">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-3817">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3817">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3818">函数 Func_eu_debit_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3818">The function Func_eu_debit_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3819">下列至少其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3819">At least one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-3820">找到 Keyword_eu_debit_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3820">A keyword from Keyword_eu_debit_card is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-3821">找到 Keyword_card_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3821">A keyword from Keyword_card_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-3822">找到 Keyword_card_security_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3822">A keyword from Keyword_card_security_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-3823">找到 Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3823">A keyword from Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-3824">函数 Func_expiration_date 找到正确日期格式的日期。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3824">The function Func_expiration_date finds a date in the right date format.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3825">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3825">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- EU Debit Card Number -->
    <Entity id="0e9b3178-9678-47dd-a509-37222ca96b42" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_eu_debit_card" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_eu_debit_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_security_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_card_expiration_terms_dict" />
          <Match idRef="Func_expiration_date" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_card_terms_dict"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-3833">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3833">Keyword_card_terms_dict</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3834">acct nbr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3834">acct nbr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3836">acct no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3836">acct no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-3837">american express</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-3837">american express</span></span>

## <a name="finland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4271">芬兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4271">Finland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4272">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4272">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4273">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4273">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4274">10个数字和包含连字符的字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4274">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4275">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4275">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4276">10个数字和包含连字符的字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4276">ten digits and letters containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4277">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4277">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4278">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4278">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4279">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4279">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4280">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4280">a digit or letter</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4281">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4281">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4282">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4282">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4283">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4283">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4284">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4284">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4285">正则表达式  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4285">The regular expression  `Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4286">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4286">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Finland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="bb3b27a3-79bd-4ac4-81a7-f9fca3c7d1a7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-european-health-insurance-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4417">芬兰欧洲健康保险电话号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4417">Finland european health insurance number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4418">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4418">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4419">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4419">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4420">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4420">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4421">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4421">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4422">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4422">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4423">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4423">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4424">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4424">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4425">20位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4425">20 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4426">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4426">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4427">20位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4427">20-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4428">10位数-8024680246</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4428">ten digits - 8024680246</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4429">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4429">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4430">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4430">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4431">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4431">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4432">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4432">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4433">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4433">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4434">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4434">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4435">正则表达式 Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4435">The regex Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4436">找到 Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4436">A keyword from Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finland European Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="60f75aed-81bf-4625-89b0-0846b9248ee7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Finland_European_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4454">芬兰国家/地区 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4454">Finland national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4455">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4455">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4456">6个数字加上一个字符，表示一个世纪加上三个数字加上校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4456">six digits plus a character indicating a century plus three digits plus a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4457">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4457">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4458">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4458">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4459">6位数，格式格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4459">six digits in the format format DDMMYY which are a date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4460">世纪标记 (是 "-"、"+" 或 "a" ) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4460">century marker (either '-', '+' or 'a')</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4461">三位数的个人标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4461">three-digit personal identification number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4462">不区分大小写的数字或字母 () 是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4462">a digit or letter (case insensitive) which is a check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4463">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4463">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4464">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4464">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4465">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4465">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4466">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4467">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4467">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4468">找到 Keyword_finnish_national_id 中的关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4468">a keyword from Keyword_finnish_national_id is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4469">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4469">the checksum passes</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4470">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4471">函数 Func_finnish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4471">the function Func_finnish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4472">校验和传递</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4472">the checksum passes</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Finnish National ID-->
      <Entity id="338FD995-4CB5-4F87-AD35-79BD1DD926C1" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finnish_national_id" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4521">芬兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4521">Finland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4522">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4522">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4523">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4523">Format</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4524">九个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4524">combination of nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4525">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4525">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4526">九个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4526">combination of nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4527">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4527">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4528">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4528">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4529">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4529">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4530">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4530">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4531">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4531">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4532">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4532">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4533">正则表达式 Regex_finland_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4533">The regular expression Regex_finland_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4534">找到 Keywords_eu_passport_number_common 或 Keyword_finland_passport_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4534">A keyword from Keywords_eu_passport_number_common or Keyword_finland_passport_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Finland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="d1685ac3-1d3a-40f8-8198-32ef5669c7a5" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_finland_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_finland_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="finland-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4555">芬兰社会保障号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4555">Finland social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4556">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4556">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4557">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4557">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4558">指定格式的11个字符的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4558">An 11-character combination in the specified format</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4559">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4559">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4560">指定格式的11个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4560">an 11-character combination in the specified format:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4561">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4561">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4562">以下任一实例：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4562">one instance of one of the following:</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-4563">加号符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4563">plus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-4564">负号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4564">minus symbol</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-4565">字母 "A" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4565">the letter "A" (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4566">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4566">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4567">一个字母或一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4567">one letter or one digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4568">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4568">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4569">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4569">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4570">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4570">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4571">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4571">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4572">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4572">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4573">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4573">A keyword from  `Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4574">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4574">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4575">函数  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4575">The function  `Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_finland_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="france-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4599">法国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4599">France driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4600">此敏感信息类型实体在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4600">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4601">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4601">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4602">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4602">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4603">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4603">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4604">12 个数字，会对类似模式（如法国电话号码）进行验证</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4604">12 digits with validation to discount similar patterns such as French telephone numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4605">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4605">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4606">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4606">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4607">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4607">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4608">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4608">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4609">函数 Func_french_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4609">the function Func_french_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4610">找到 Keyword_french_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4610">a keyword from Keyword_french_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="18e55a36-a01b-4b0f-943d-dc10282a1824" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_french_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4738">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4738">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4739">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4739">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4740">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4740">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4741">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4741">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4742">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4742">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4743">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4743">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4744">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4744">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4745">21位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4745">21 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4746">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4746">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4747">21位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4747">21 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4748">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4748">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4749">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4749">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4750">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4750">ten digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4751">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4751">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4752">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4752">a digit</span></span>


### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4753">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4753">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4754">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4754">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4755">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4755">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4756">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4756">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4757">正则表达式 Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4757">the regex Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4758">找到 Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4758">a keyword from Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Health Insurance Number -->
      <Entity id="9bc2069e-76df-4ff9-ac02-2f519469e236" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_France_Health_Insurance_Number"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4759">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4759">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_france_health_insurance_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4760">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4760">Keyword_France_health_insurance_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4761">保险卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4761">insurance card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4762">vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4762">carte vitale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4763">d'assuré社交</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4763">carte d'assuré social</span></span>


## <a name="france-national-id-card-cni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4764">法国国家 id 卡片 (CNI) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4764">France national id card (CNI)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4765">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4765">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4766">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4766">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4767">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4767">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4768">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4768">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4769">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4769">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4770">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4770">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4771">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4771">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4772">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4772">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4773">正则表达式 Regex_france_cni 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4773">The regular expression Regex_france_cni finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4774">找到 Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4774">A keyword from Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- France CNI -->
    <Entity id="f741ac74-1bc0-4665-b69b-f0c7f927c0c4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="65">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_france_cni" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_france_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4776">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4776">Keywords_france_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4779">nationale d'idenite</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4779">carte nationale d'idenite no</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4783">national identification number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4783">national identification number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4784">国家标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4784">national identity</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4785">nationalidno#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4785">nationalidno#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4787">numéro 的反 vitale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4787">numéro de carte vitale</span></span>

   
## <a name="france-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4788">法国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4788">France passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4789">此敏感信息类型实体可用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4789">This sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4790">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4790">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4791">9个数字和字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4791">nine digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4792">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4792">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4793">9个数字和字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4793">nine digits and letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4794">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4794">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4795">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4795">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4796">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4796">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4797">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4797">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4798">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4798">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4799">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4799">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4800">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4800">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4801">函数 Func_fr_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4801">The function Func_fr_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4802">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4802">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France Passport Number -->
<Entity id="3008b884-8c8c-4cd8-a289-99f34fc7ff5d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_fr_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4803">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4803">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4804">Keyword_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4804">Keyword_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4805">Passport Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4805">Passport Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4806">Passport No</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4806">Passport No</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4807">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4807">Passport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4808">登记卡#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4808">Passport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4809">PassportID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4809">PassportID</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4810">Passportno</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4810">Passportno</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4811">passportnumber</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4811">passportnumber</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4812">パスポート</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4812">パスポート</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4813">パスポート番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4813">パスポート番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4814">パスポートのNum</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4814">パスポートのNum</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4815">パスポート ＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4815">パスポート ＃</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4816">Numéro de passeport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4816">Numéro de passeport</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4817">Passeport n °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4817">Passeport n °</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4818">Passeport Non</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4818">Passeport Non</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4819">Passeport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4819">Passeport #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4820">Passeport#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4820">Passeport#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4821">PasseportNon</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4821">PasseportNon</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4822">Passeportn °</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4822">Passeportn °</span></span>

      
## <a name="france-social-security-number-insee-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4823">法国社会保障号 (INSEE) 或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4823">France social security number (INSEE) or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4824">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号和等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4824">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number and Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4825">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4825">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4826">15 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4826">15 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4827">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4827">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4828">必须匹配两种模式之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4828">Must match one of two patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4829">13位数，后跟一个空格，后跟两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4829">13 digits followed by a space followed by two digits</span></span><br/>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4830">或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4830">or</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4831">15 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4831">15 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4832">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4832">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4833">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4833">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4834">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4834">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4835">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4835">A DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4836">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4836">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4837">找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4837">A keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4838">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4838">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4839">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4839">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4840">函数 Func_french_insee 或 Func_fr_insee 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4840">The function Func_french_insee or Func_fr_insee finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4841">未找到 Keyword_fr_insee 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4841">No keyword from Keyword_fr_insee is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4842">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4842">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- France INSEE -->
<Entity id="71f62b97-efe0-4aa1-aa49-e14de253619d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_french_insee" />
        <Match idRef="Func_fr_insee" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_fr_insee" />
        </Any>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4843">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4843">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_fr_insee"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4844">Keyword_fr_insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4844">Keyword_fr_insee</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4845">insee</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4845">insee</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4846">securité sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4846">securité sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4847">securite sociale</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4847">securite sociale</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4848">national id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4848">national id</span></span>

## <a name="france-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4868">法国纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4868">France tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4869">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4869">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4870">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4870">13 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4871">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4871">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4872">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4872">13 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4873">一个数字，必须为0、1、2或3</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4873">One digit that must be 0, 1, 2, or 3</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4874">1位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4874">1 digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4875">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4875">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4876">2位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4876">2 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4877">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4877">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4878">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4878">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4879">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4879">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4880">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4880">3 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4881">一个空格（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4881">A space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4882">3个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4882">3 check digits</span></span> 

  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4883">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4883">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4884">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4884">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4885">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4885">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4886">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4886">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4887">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4887">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4888">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4888">A keyword from  `Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4889">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4889">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4890">函数  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4890">The function  `Func_france_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- France Tax Identification Number (numéro SPI.) -->
      <Entity id="ed59e77e-171d-442c-9ec1-88e2ebcb5b0a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_france_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4903">taxidnumber#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4903">taxidnumber#</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4907">纳税人 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4907">tin id</span></span>

## <a name="france-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4910">法国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4910">France value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4911">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4911">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4912">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4912">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4913">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4913">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4914">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4914">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4915">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4915">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4916">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4916">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4917">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4917">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4918">13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4918">13 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4919">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4919">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4920">13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4920">13 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4921">两个字母-FR (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4921">two letters  - FR (case insensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4922">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4922">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4923">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4923">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4924">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4924">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4925">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4925">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4926">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4926">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4927">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4927">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4928">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4928">an optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4929">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4929">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4930">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4930">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4931">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4931">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4932">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4932">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4933">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4933">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4934">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4934">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4935">找到 Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4935">A keyword from Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4936">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4936">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4937">函数 Func_france_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4937">The function Func_france_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- France Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="949121e6-ad9f-4379-8731-710342baea78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_france_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_france_value_added_tax_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4939">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4939">Keyword_France_value_added_tax_number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4950">德国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4950">Germany driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-4951">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4951">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4952">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4952">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4953">11个数字和字母的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4953">combination of 11 digits and letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4954">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4954">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4955">11 位数字和字母（不区分大小写）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4955">11 digits and letters (not case sensitive):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4956">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4956">a digit or letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4957">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4957">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4958">六个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4958">six digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4959">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4959">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4960">一个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4960">a digit or letter</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4961">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4961">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4962">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4962">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-4963">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4963">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-4964">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4964">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4965">函数 Func_german_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4965">The function Func_german_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4966">找到 Keyword_german_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4966">A keyword from Keyword_german_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-4967">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-4967">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Driver's License Number -->
    <Entity id="91da9335-1edb-45b7-a95f-5fe41a16c63c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_drivers_license" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="germany-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5116">德国身份卡片编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5116">Germany identity card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5117">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5117">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5118">自2010年11月1日起：九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5118">since 1 November 2010: Nine letters and digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5119">从1年4月1987至31年10月2010：10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5119">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010: 10 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5120">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5120">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5121">自2010年11月1日起：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5121">since 1 November 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5122">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5122">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5123">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5123">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5124">介于1年4月1987至 31 10 月2010：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5124">from 1 April 1987 until 31 October 2010:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5125">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5125">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5126">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5126">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5127">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5127">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5128">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5128">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5129">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5129">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5130">正则表达式 Regex_germany_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5130">The regular expression Regex_germany_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5131">找到 Keyword_germany_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5131">A keyword from Keyword_germany_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Germany Identity Card Number -->
<Entity id="e577372f-c42e-47a0-9d85-bebed1c237d4" recommendedConfidence="65" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_germany_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_germany_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_germany_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5133">Keyword_germany_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5133">Keyword_germany_id_card</span></span>
