## <a name="germany-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5147">德国护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5147">Germany passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5148">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5148">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5149">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5149">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5150">10个数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5150">ten digits or letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5151">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5151">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5152">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5152">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5153">第一个字符是数字或从该集合中的字母 (C、F、G、H、J、K) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5153">first character is a digit or a letter from this set (C, F, G, H, J, K)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5154">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5154">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5155">此集合中的五个数字或字母 (C、-H、J-N、P、R、T、V-Z) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5155">five digits or letters from this set (C, -H, J-N, P, R, T, V-Z)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5156">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5156">a digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5157">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5157">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5158">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5158">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5159">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5159">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5160">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5160">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5161">函数 Func_german_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5161">The function Func_german_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5162">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5162">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5163">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5163">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5164">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5164">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5165">函数 Func_german_passport_data 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5165">The function Func_german_passport_data finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5166">找到了中的关键字 `Keyword_german_passport` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5166">A keyword from `Keyword_german_passport` is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5167">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5167">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- German Passport Number -->
    <Entity id="2e3da144-d42b-47ed-b123-fbf78604e52c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_german_passport_data" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_german_passport" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5168">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5168">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5172">No-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5172">No-Reisepass</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5173">Nr-Reisepass</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5173">Nr-Reisepass</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5174">Reisepass-Nr</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5174">Reisepass-Nr</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5177">passeport。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5177">passeport no.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5178">passeport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5178">passeport no</span></span>

## <a name="germany-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5179">德国税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5179">Germany tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5180">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5180">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5181">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5181">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5182">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5182">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5183">11位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5183">11 digits :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5184">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5184">Two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5185">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5185">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5186">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5186">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5187">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5187">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5188">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5188">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5189">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5189">An optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5190">两位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5190">Two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5191">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5191">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5192">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5192">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5193">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5193">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5194">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5194">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5195">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5195">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5196">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5196">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5197">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5197">A keyword from  `Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5199">函数  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5199">The function  `Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Germany Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="43316a89-9880-40cf-b980-04bc7eefcec5" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5200">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5200">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5201">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5201">Keywords_germany_eu_tax_file_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5202">identifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5202">identifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5203">steuer id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5203">steuer id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5204">steueridentifikationsnummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5204">steueridentifikationsnummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5205">steuernummer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5205">steuernummer</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5206">tax id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5206">tax id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5207">税号标识编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5207">tax identification no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5208">税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5208">tax identification number</span></span>

## <a name="germany-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5225">德国增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5225">Germany value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5226">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5226">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5227">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5227">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5228">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5228">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5229">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5229">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5230">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5230">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5231">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5231">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5232">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5232">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5233">11个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5233">11 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5234">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5234">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5235">11个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5235">11-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5236">字母 D 或 D</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5236">a letter D or d</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5237">字母 E 或 E</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5237">a letter E or e</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5238">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5238">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5239">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5239">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5240">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5240">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5241">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5241">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5242">可选空格或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5242">an optional space or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5243">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5243">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5244">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5244">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5245">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5245">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5246">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5246">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5247">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5247">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5248">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5248">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5249">找到 Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5249">A keyword from Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5250">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5250">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5251">函数 Func_germany_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5251">The function Func_germany_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Germany Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="db177eb2-8811-4842-bffc-128c14aa219f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_germany_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5257">vat # mehrwertsteuer</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5257">vat#  mehrwertsteuer</span></span>

## <a name="greece-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5261">希腊驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5261">Greece driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5262">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5262">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5263">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5263">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5264">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5264">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5265">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5265">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5266">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5266">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5267">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5267">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5268">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5268">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5269">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5269">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5270">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5270">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5271">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5271">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5272">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5272">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greece Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="7a2200b5-aacf-4e3c-ab36-136d3e68b7da" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-national-id-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5398">希腊国家 ID 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5398">Greece national ID card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5399">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5399">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5400">7-8 个字母和数字组合加一个短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5400">Combination of 7-8 letters and numbers plus a dash</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5401">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5401">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5402">七个字母和数字（旧格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5402">Seven letters and numbers (old format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5403">一个字母（希腊字母表中的任一字母） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5403">One letter (any letter of the Greek alphabet)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5404">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5404">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5405">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5405">Six digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5406">八个字母和数字（新格式）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5406">Eight letters and numbers (new format):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5407">大写字符同时出现在希腊和拉丁字母表中的两个字母 (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5407">Two letters whose uppercase character occurs in both the Greek and Latin alphabets (ABEZHIKMNOPTYX)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5408">一个短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5408">A dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5409">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5409">Six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5410">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5410">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5411">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5411">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5412">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5412">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5413">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5413">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5414">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5414">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5415">找到 Keyword_greece_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5415">A keyword from Keyword_greece_id_card is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5416">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5416">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5417">正则表达式 Regex_greece_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5417">The regular expression Regex_greece_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Greece National ID Card -->
      <Entity id="82568215-1da1-46d3-874a-d2294d81b5ac" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5422">希腊语个人 id 卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5422">greek personal id card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5423">希腊警察 id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5423">greek police id</span></span>

## <a name="greece-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5428">希腊护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5428">Greece passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5429">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5429">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5430">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5430">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5431">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5431">Two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5432">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5432">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5433">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5433">Two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5434">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5434">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5435">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5435">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5436">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5436">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5437">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5437">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5438">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5438">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5439">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5439">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="greece-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5456">希腊税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5456">Greece tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5457">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5457">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5458">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5458">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5459">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5459">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5460">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5460">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5461">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5461">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5462">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5462">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5463">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5463">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5464">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5464">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5465">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5465">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5466">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5466">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5467">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5467">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5468">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5468">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5469">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5469">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5470">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5470">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5471">正则表达式  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5471">The regular expression  `Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5472">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5472">A keyword from  `Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Greek Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="15a54a5a-53d4-4080-ad43-a2a4fe1d3bf7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_greece_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hong-kong-identity-card-hkid-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5501">香港 HKID) 号码的香港身份卡片 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5501">Hong Kong identity card (HKID) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5502">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5502">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5503">8-9 个字母和数字组合，最后一个字符两边可选择加括号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5503">Combination of 8-9 letters and numbers plus optional parentheses around the final character</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5504">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5504">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5505">8-9 个字母组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5505">Combination of 8-9 letters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5506">1-2 个字母（不区分大小写） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5506">1-2 letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5507">六个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5507">Six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5508">最后一个字符（任意数字或字母 A）是校验位，两边可以选择加括号。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5508">The final character (any digit or the letter A), which is the check digit and is optionally enclosed in parentheses.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5509">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5509">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5510">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5510">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5511">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5511">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5512">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5512">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5513">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5513">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5514">找到 Keyword_hong_kong_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5514">A keyword from Keyword_hong_kong_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5515">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5515">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5516">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5516">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5517">函数 Func_hong_kong_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5517">The function Func_hong_kong_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5518">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5518">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Hong Kong Identity Card (HKID) number -->
<Entity id="e63c28a7-ad29-4c17-a41a-3d2a0b70fd9c" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_hong_kong_id_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5558">匈牙利驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5558">Hungary driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5559">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5559">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5560">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5560">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5561">两个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5561">Two letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5562">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5562">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5563">两个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5563">Two letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5564">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5564">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5565">六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5565">Six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5566">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5566">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5567">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5567">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5568">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5568">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5570">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5570">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5571">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5571">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <Entity id="9d31c46b-6e6b-444c-aeb1-6dd7e604bb24" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-personal-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5696">匈牙利个人标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5696">Hungary personal identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5697">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5697">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5698">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5698">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5699">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5699">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5700">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5700">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5701">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5701">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5702">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5702">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5703">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5703">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5704">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5704">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5705">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5705">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5706">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5706">11 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5707">一种与性别相对应的数字 (1-男、2-女、其他号码也可能适用于在具有双公民的1900或公民之前出生的公民) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5707">One digit that corresponds to gender (1-male, 2-female, other numbers are also possible for citizens born before 1900 or citizens with double citizenship)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5708">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5708">Six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5709">与序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5709">Three digits that correspond to a serial number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5710">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5710">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5711">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5711">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5712">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5712">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5713">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5713">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5714">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5714">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5715">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5715">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5716">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5716">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5717">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5717">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5718">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5718">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Personal Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="7b5cc218-7046-47d9-80c9-f325b50896ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5729">匈牙利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5729">Hungary passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5730">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5730">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5731">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5731">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5732">两个字母后跟6个或7个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5732">Two letters followed by six or seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5733">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5733">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5734">两个字母后跟六个或七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5734">Two letters followed by six or seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5736">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5736">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5738">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5738">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5739">正则表达式  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5739">The regular expression  `Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5740">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5740">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5757">匈牙利社会安全号码或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5757">Hungary social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5758">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5758">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5759">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5759">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5760">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5760">Nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5761">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5761">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5762">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5762">Nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5763">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5763">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5764">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5764">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5765">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5765">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5766">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5766">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5767">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5767">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5768">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5768">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5769">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5769">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5770">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5770">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5790">匈牙利纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5790">Hungary tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5791">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5791">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5792">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5792">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5793">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5793">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5794">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5794">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5795">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5795">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5796">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5796">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5798">10个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5798">Ten digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5799">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5800">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5800">Ten digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5801">一个必须为 "8" 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5801">One digit that must be "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5802">八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5802">Eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5803">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5803">One check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5804">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5804">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5805">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5805">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5806">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5806">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5807">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5807">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5808">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5808">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5809">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5809">A keyword from  `Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5810">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5810">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5811">函数  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5811">The function  `Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Hungary Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="ede42eb4-59d9-49eb-9603-d7853fbda91d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungary_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_hungary_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="hungary-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5837">匈牙利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5837">Hungary value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5838">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5838">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5839">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5839">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5840">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5840">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5841">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5841">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5842">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5842">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5843">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5843">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5844">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5844">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5845">10个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5845">10 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5846">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5846">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5847">10个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5847">10 character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5848">2个字母-HU 或 HU</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5848">2 letters - HU or hu</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5849">可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5849">optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5850">8位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5850">8 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5851">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5851">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5852">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5852">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5853">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5853">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5854">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5854">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5855">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5855">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5856">找到 Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5856">A keyword from Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5857">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5857">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5858">函数 Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5858">The function Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Hungarian Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="976349a0-683b-477a-90f8-ff0a220d5592" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_hungarian_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="india-permanent-account-number-pan"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5872"> (PAN) 的印度永久帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5872">India permanent account number (PAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5873">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5873">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5874">10 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5874">10 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5875">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5875">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5876">10 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5876">10 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5877">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5877">Three letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5878">C、P、H、F、A、T、B、L、J 和 G (中的字母不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5878">A letter in C, P, H, F, A, T, B, L, J, G (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5879">一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5879">A letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5880">四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5880">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5881">字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5881">A letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5882">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5882">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5883">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5883">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5884">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5884">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5885">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5885">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5886">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5886">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5887">找到 Keyword_india_permanent_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5887">A keyword from Keyword_india_permanent_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5888">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5888">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5889">正则表达式 Regex_india_permanent_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5889">The regular expression Regex_india_permanent_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>


```xml
      <!-- India Permanent Account Number -->
      <Entity id="2602bfee-9bb0-47a5-a7a6-2bf3053e2804" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_india_permanent_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Version minEngineVersion="15.20.3520.000">
          <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_india_permanent_account_number" />
          </Pattern>
        </Version>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5890">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5890">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_india_permanent_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5891">Keyword_india_permanent_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5892">Permanent Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5892">Permanent Account Number</span></span>
