## <a name="india-unique-identification-aadhaar-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5894">印度唯一标识 (Aadhaar) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5894">India unique identification (Aadhaar) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5895">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5895">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5896">12 个数字（包含可选空格或短划线）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5896">12 digits containing optional spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5897">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5897">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5898">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5898">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5899">一个不为0或1的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5899">A digit which is not 0 or 1</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5900">三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5900">Three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5901">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5901">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5902">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5902">Four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5903">一个可选空格或短划线 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5903">An optional space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5904">最后一个数字是校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5904">The final digit which is the check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5905">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5905">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5906">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5906">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5907">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5907">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5908">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5908">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5909">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5909">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5910">找到 Keyword_india_aadhar 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5910">A keyword from Keyword_india_aadhar is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5911">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5911">The checksum passes.</span></span>
- 
<span data-ttu-id="68240-5912">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5912">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5913">函数 Func_india_aadhaar 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5913">The function Func_india_aadhaar finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5914">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5914">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- India Unique Identification (Aadhaar) number -->
<Entity id="1ca46b29-76f5-4f46-9383-cfa15e91048f" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_india_aadhar"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_india_aadhaar"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5915">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5915">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_india_aadhar"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5916">Keyword_india_aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5917">aadhaar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5917">aadhaar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5918">aadhar</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5918">aadhar</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5919">aadhar#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5919">aadhar#</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5920">uid</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5920">uid</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5921">आधार</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5921">आधार</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5922">uidai</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5922">uidai</span></span>
   
## <a name="indonesia-identity-card-ktp-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5923">印度尼西亚身份卡片 (KTP) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5923">Indonesia identity card (KTP) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5924">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5924">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5925">16 个数字（包含可选点）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5925">16 digits containing optional periods</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5926">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5926">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5927">16 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5927">16 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5928">两位省代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5928">Two-digit province code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5929">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5929">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5930">两位摄政统治区或城市代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5930">Two-digit regency or city code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5931">两位住宅小区代码 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5931">Two-digit subdistrict code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5932">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5932">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5933">六个数字，采用  DDMMYY 格式，代表出生日期 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5933">Six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5934">一个点（可选） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5934">A period (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5935">四个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5935">Four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5936">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5936">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5937">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5937">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5938">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5938">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5939">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5939">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5940">正则表达式 Regex_indonesia_id_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5940">The regular expression Regex_indonesia_id_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5941">找到 Keyword_indonesia_id_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5941">A keyword from Keyword_indonesia_id_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Indonesia Identity Card (KTP) Number -->
<Entity id="da68fdb0-f383-4981-8c86-82689d3b7d55" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_indonesia_id_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_indonesia_id_card"/>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5942">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5942">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_indonesia_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5943">Keyword_indonesia_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5944">KTP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5944">KTP</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5945">Kartu Tanda Penduduk</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5946">Nomor Induk Kependudukan</span></span> 
   
## <a name="international-banking-account-number-iban"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5947"> (IBAN) 的国际银行帐户号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5947">International banking account number (IBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5948">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5948">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5949">国家/地区代码（两个字母）加校验位（两个数字）以及 bban 号码（最多 30 个字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5949">Country code (two letters) plus check digits (two digits) plus bban number (up to 30 characters)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5950">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5950">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5951">模式必须包括以下各项：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5951">Pattern must include all of the following:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5952">两个字母的国家/地区代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5952">Two-letter country code</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5953">两个校验位（后跟一个可选空间） </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5953">Two check digits (followed by an optional space)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5954">1-7 个包含 4 个字母或数字的组（可以使用空格进行分隔）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5954">1-7 groups of four letters or digits (can be separated by spaces)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5955">1-3 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5955">1-3 letters or digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-p133">每个国家/地区的格式稍有不同。IBAN 敏感信息类型涵盖这 60 个国家/地区：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-p133">The format for each country is slightly different. The IBAN sensitive information type covers these 60 countries:</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5958">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5958">ad, ae, al, at, az, ba, be, bg, bh, ch, cr, cy, cz, de, dk, do, ee, es, fi, fo, fr, gb, ge, gi, gl, gr, hr, hu, ie, il, is, it, kw, kz, lb, li, lt, lu, lv, mc, md, me, mk, mr, mt, mu, nl, no, pl, pt, ro, rs, sa, se, si, sk, sm, tn, tr, vg</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5959">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5959">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5960">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5960">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5961">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5961">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5962">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5962">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5963">函数 Func_iban 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5963">The function Func_iban finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5964">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5964">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="e7dc4711-11b7-4cb0-b88b-2c394a771f0e" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_iban" />
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5965">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5965">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5966">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5966">None</span></span>

   
## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-10-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5967">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-10-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5967">International classification of diseases (ICD-10-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5968">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5968">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5969">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5969">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5970">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5970">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5971">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5971">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5972">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5972">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5973">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5973">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5974">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5974">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5975">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5975">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5976">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5976">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5977">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5977">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5978">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5978">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5979">找到 Dictionary_icd_10_ 更新的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5979">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_10_ updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- ICD-10 CM -->
      <Entity id="3356946c-6bb7-449b-b253-6ffa419c0ce7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_10_updated" />
        </Pattern>

```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5980">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5980">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5981">Dictionary_icd_10_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5981">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-5982">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5982">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5983">Dictionary_icd_10_codes 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类 Diseases、第10次修订、临床修改 (icd-10-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5983">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_10_codes keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases, Tenth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-10-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852604).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-5984">此类型仅查找保险业代码，而不是说明。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5984">This type looks only for insurance codes, not the description.</span></span>

## <a name="international-classification-of-diseases-icd-9-cm"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5985">国际分类的 diseases (ICD-9-CM) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5985">International classification of diseases (ICD-9-CM)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5986">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5986">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5987">Dictionary</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5987">Dictionary</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5988">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5988">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5989">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5989">Keyword</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5990">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5990">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5991">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5991">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5992">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5992">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5993">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5993">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5994">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5994">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5995">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_codes 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5995">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_codes is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5996">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5996">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-5997">找到 Dictionary_icd_9_updated 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5997">A keyword from Dictionary_icd_9_updated is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <Entity id="fa3f9c74-ee07-4c52-b5f2-085d6b2c0ec4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
          <Match idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_codes" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Dictionary_icd_9_updated" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-5998">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5998">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-5999">Dictionary_icd_9_updated 关键字词典中的任何术语，基于 [国际分类的 Diseases、第九修订版、临床修改 (icd-9-CM) ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605)。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-5999">Any term from the Dictionary_icd_9_updated keyword dictionary, which is based on the [International Classification of Diseases,Ninth Revision, Clinical Modification (ICD-9-CM)](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=852605).</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-6000">此类型仅查找术语，而不是保险代码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6000">This type looks only for the term, not the insurance codes.</span></span>

## <a name="ip-address"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6003">IP 地址</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6003">IP address</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6004">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6004">Format</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv4"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6005">IPv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6005">IPv4:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6006">解释 IPv4 地址格式化（点）版本或非格式化（没有点）版本的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6006">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted (periods) and unformatted (no periods) versions of the IPv4 addresses</span></span>

#### <a name="ipv6"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6007">Ipv4</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6007">IPv6:</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6008"> 解释格式化 IPv6 号码（包含冒号）的复杂模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6008">Complex pattern which accounts for formatted IPv6 numbers (which include colons)</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6009">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6009">Pattern</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6010">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6010">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6011">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6011">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6012">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6012">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6013">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6013">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6014">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6014">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6015">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6015">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6016">对于 IPv4，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6016">For IPv4, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6017">正则表达式 Regex_ipv4_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6017">The regular expression Regex_ipv4_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6018">找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6018">A keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6019">对于 IPv6，在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 95% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6019">For IPv6, a DLP policy is 95% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6020">正则表达式 Regex_ipv6_address 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6020">The regular expression Regex_ipv6_address finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6021">未找到 Keyword_ipaddress 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6021">No keyword from Keyword_ipaddress is found.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- IP Address -->
    <Entity id="1daa4ad5-e2dd-4ca4-a788-54722c09efb2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv4_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="95">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ipv6_address" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_ipaddress" />
        </Any>
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6024">IP（此关键字区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6024">IP (this keyword is case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6025">ip address</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6025">ip address</span></span>

## <a name="ireland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6029">爱尔兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6029">Ireland driver's license number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6030">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6030">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6031">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6031">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6032">6位数，后跟四个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6032">Six digits followed by four letters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6033">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6033">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6034">6位数字和四个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6034">Six digits and four letters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6035">六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6035">Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6036">四个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6036">Four letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6037">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6037">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6038">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6038">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6039">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6039">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6040">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6040">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6041">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6041">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6042">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6042">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Ireland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="e01bccd9-eb4d-414f-ace1-e9b6a4c4a2ca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6166">爱尔兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6166">Ireland passport number</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6167">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6167">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6168">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6168">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6169">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6169">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6170">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6170">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6171">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6171">Two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6172">两位数字或字母（不区分大小写）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6172">Two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6173">七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6173">Seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6174">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6174">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6175">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6175">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6176">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6176">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6177">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6177">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6178">正则表达式  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6178">The regular expression  `Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6179">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6179">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ireland-personal-public-service-pps-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6200">爱尔兰个人公开服务 (PPS) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6200">Ireland personal public service (PPS) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6201">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6201">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6202">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6202">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6203">七位数字后跟1-2 个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6203">seven digits followed by 1-2 letters</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6204">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6204">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6205">七位数字后跟两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6205">seven digits followed by two letters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6206">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6206">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6207">旧格式 (到 31 Dec 2012) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6207">Old format (until 31 Dec 2012):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6208">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6208">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6209">一到两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6209">one to two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6210">新格式 (1 Jan 2013 和) 之后）：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6210">New format (1 Jan 2013 and after):</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6211">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6211">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6212">字母 (区分大小写) 这是字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6212">a letter (not case sensitive) which is an alphabetic check digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6213">一个-I 范围内的可选字母，或 "W"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6213">An optional letter in the range A-I, or “W”</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6214">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6214">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6215">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6215">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6216">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6216">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6217">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6217">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6218">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6218">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6219">找到 Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6219">A keyword from Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6220">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6220">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6221">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6222">函数 Func_ireland_pps 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6222">The function Func_ireland_pps finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6223">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6223">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ireland Personal Public Service (PPS) Number -->
      <Entity id="1cdb674d-c19a-4fcf-9f4b-7f56cc87345a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85" relaxProximity="true">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_ireland_pps" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6224">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6224">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6225">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6225">Keywords_ireland_eu_national_id_card</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6226">客户端标识服务</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6226">client identity service</span></span>

## <a name="israel-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6268">以色列银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6268">Israel bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6269">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6269">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6270">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6270">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6271">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6271">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6272">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6272">Formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6273">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6273">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6274">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6274">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6275">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6275">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6276">短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6276">a dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6277">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6277">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6278">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6278">Unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6279">	13 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6279">13 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6280">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6280">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6281">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6281">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6282">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6282">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6283">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6283">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6284">正则表达式 Regex_israel_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6284">The regular expression Regex_israel_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6285">找到 Keyword_israel_bank_account_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6285">A keyword from Keyword_israel_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="7d08b2ff-a0b9-437f-957c-aeddbf9b2b25" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_israel_bank_account_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_israel_bank_account_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6286">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6286">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_israel_bank_account_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6287">Keyword_israel_bank_account_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6288">Bank Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6288">Bank Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6289">Bank Account</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6289">Bank Account</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6290">Account Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6290">Account Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6291">מספר חשבון בנק</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6291">מספר חשבון בנק</span></span> 
   
## <a name="israel-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6292">以色列国家身份证号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6292">Israel national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6293">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6293">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6294">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6294">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6295">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6295">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6296">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6296">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6297">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6297">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6298">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6298">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6299">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6299">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6300">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6300">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6301">函数 Func_israeli_national_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6301">The function Func_israeli_national_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6302">找到 Keyword_Israel_National_ID 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6302">A keyword from Keyword_Israel_National_ID is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6303">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6303">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Israel National ID Number -->
<Entity id="e05881f5-1db1-418c-89aa-a3ac5c5277ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_israeli_national_id_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Israel_National_ID" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

-   <span data-ttu-id="68240-6309">זהותישר אלית</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6309">זהותישר אלית</span></span>

-   <span data-ttu-id="68240-6311">هوية إسرائ يلية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6311">هوية إسرائ يلية</span></span>
-   <span data-ttu-id="68240-6312">رقم الهوية</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6312">رقم الهوية</span></span>

## <a name="italy-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6322">意大利驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6322">Italy driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6323">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6323">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6324">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6324">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6325">10个字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6325">a combination of 10 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6326">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6326">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6327">10个字母和数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6327">a combination of 10 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6328">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6328">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6329">字母 "A" 或 "V" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6329">the letter "A" or "V" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6330">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6330">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6331">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6331">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6332">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6332">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6333">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6333">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6334">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6334">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6335">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6335">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6336">正则表达式 Regex_italy_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6336">The regular expression Regex_italy_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6337">找到 Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6337">A keyword from Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Italy Driver's license Number -->
<Entity id="97d6244f-9157-41bd-8e0c-9d669a5c4d71" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6338">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6338">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_italy_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6339">Keyword_italy_drivers_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="italy-fiscal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6345">意大利会计代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6345">Italy fiscal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6346">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6346">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6347">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6347">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6348">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6348">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6349">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6349">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6350">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6350">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6351">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6351">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6352">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6352">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6353">在指定模式中，由16个字符组成的字母和数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6353">a 16-character combination of letters and digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6354">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6354">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6355">字母和数字的16个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6355">A 16-character combination of letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6356">与系列名称中的前三个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6356">three letters that correspond to the first three consonants in the family name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6357">与名字中的第一个、第三个和第四个辅音对应的三个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6357">three letters that correspond to the first, third, and fourth consonants in the first name</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6358">与出生年份的最后一个数字对应的两个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6358">two digits that correspond to the last digits of the birth year</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6359">一个与出生月份的字母相对应的字母–字母按字母顺序使用，但仅使用字母 A 到 E、H、L、M、P、R 和 T (因此，一月为 A，10月为 R) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6359">one letter that corresponds to the letter for the month of birth—letters are used in alphabetical order, but only the letters A to E, H, L, M, P, R to T are used (thus, January is A and October is R)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6360">与出生月份的某一天对应的两个数字，为了区分 genders，40已添加到女性的出生日。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6360">two digits that correspond to the day of the month of birth—in order to differentiate between genders, 40 is added to the day of birth for women</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6361">与特定于 municipality 的区域代码相对应的四个数字，该用户的出生国家 (国家/地区内的代码用于外国国家) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6361">four digits that corresponds to the area code specific to the municipality where the person was born (country-wide codes are used for foreign countries)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6362">一个奇偶校验数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6362">one parity digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6363">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6363">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6364">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6364">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6365">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6365">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6366">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6366">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6367">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6367">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6368">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6368">A keyword from  `Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6369">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6369">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6370">函数  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6370">The function  `Func_italy_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Italy Fiscal Code -->
      <Entity id="4cd79172-8da9-4ff5-9188-98b1e7e2eca6" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6405">意大利护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6405">Italy passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6406">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6406">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6407">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6407">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6408">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6408">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6409">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6409">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6410">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6410">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6411">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6411">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6412">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6412">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6413">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6413">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6414">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6414">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6415">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6415">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6416">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6416">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6417">正则表达式  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6417">The regular expression  `Regex_italy_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6418">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6418">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="italy-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6439">意大利增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6439">Italy value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6440">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6440">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6441">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6441">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6442">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6442">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6443">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6443">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6444">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6444">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6445">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6445">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6446">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6446">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6447">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6447">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6448">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6448">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6449">带有可选分隔符的13个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6449">13 character alphanumeric pattern with optional delimiters:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6450">I 或 i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6450">I or i</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6451">T 或 t</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6451">T or t</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6452">可选空格、点号、连字符或逗号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6452">optional space, dot, hyphen or comma</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6453">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6453">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6454">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6454">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6455">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6455">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6456">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6456">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6457">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6457">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6458">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6458">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6459">找到 Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6459">A keyword from Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6460">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6460">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6461">函数 Func_italy_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6461">The function Func_italy_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Italy Value Added Tax -->
      <Entity id="26a8cc07-2283-4a2a-ab1d-4ab643c4c67f" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_italy_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6469">日本银行帐户号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6469">Japan bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6470">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6470">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6471">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6471">seven or eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6472">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6472">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6473">银行帐户号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6473">bank account number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6474">7或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6474">seven or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6475">银行帐户分支代码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6475">bank account branch code:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6476">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6476">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6477">可选) 的空格或短划线 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6477">a space or dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6478">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6478">three digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6479">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6479">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6480">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6480">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6481">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6481">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6482">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6482">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6483">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6483">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6484">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6484">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6485">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6485">One of the following is true:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6486">函数 Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6486">The function Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6487">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6487">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6488">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6488">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6489">函数 Func_jp_bank_account 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6489">The function Func_jp_bank_account finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6490">找到 Keyword_jp_bank_account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6490">A keyword from Keyword_jp_bank_account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="d354f95b-96ee-4b80-80bc-4377312b55bc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
  <Version minEngineVersion="15.01.0131.000">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Func_jp_bank_account_branch_code" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_branch_code" />
          </Any>
      </Pattern>
  </Version>    
     <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_bank_account" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_bank_account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6537">日本驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6537">Japan driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6538">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6538">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6539">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6539">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6540">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6540">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6541">12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6541">12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6542">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6542">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6543">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6543">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6544">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6544">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6545">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6545">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6546">函数 Func_jp_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6546">The function Func_jp_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6547">找到 Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6547">A keyword from Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="c6011143-d087-451c-8313-7f6d4aed2270" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_drivers_license_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-my-number---corporate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6585">日本我的号码-公司</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6585">Japan My Number - Corporate</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6586">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6586">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6587">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6587">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6588">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6588">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6589">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6589">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6590">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6590">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6591">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6591">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6592">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6593">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6593">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6594">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6595">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6595">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6596">一位数从1到9</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6596">one digit from one to nine</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6597">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6597">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6598">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6598">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6599">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6599">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6600">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6600">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6601">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6601">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6602">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6602">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6603">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6603">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6604">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6604">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6605">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_corporate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6605">The function Func_japanese_my_number_corporate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Corporate -->
      <Entity id="9e0eaf79-ff20-4ffb-b3e4-e7368d5db6ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_corporate" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6615">個人識別ナンバー</span></span>

## <a name="japan-my-number---personal"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6618">日本我的号码-个人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6618">Japan My Number - Personal</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6619">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6619">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6620">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6620">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6621">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6621">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6622">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6622">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6623">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6623">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6624">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6624">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6625">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6625">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6626">12位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6626">12 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6627">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6627">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6628">12位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6628">12 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6629">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6629">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6630">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6630">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6631">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6631">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6632">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6632">an optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6633">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6633">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6634">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6634">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6635">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6635">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6636">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6636">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6637">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6637">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6638">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6638">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6639">找到 Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6639">A keyword from Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6640">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6640">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6641">函数 Func_japanese_my_number_personal 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6641">The function Func_japanese_my_number_personal finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Japanese My Number – Personal -->
      <Entity id="98da8e66-7299-4ebd-9f82-c871ab37d3ef" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_japanese_my_number_personal" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="japan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6654">日本护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6654">Japan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6655">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6655">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6656">两个字母后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6656">two letters followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6657">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6657">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6658">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6658">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6659">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6659">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6660">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6660">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6661">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6661">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6662">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6662">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6663">函数 Func_jp_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6663">The function Func_jp_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6664">找到 Keyword_jp_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6664">A keyword from Keyword_jp_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="75177310-1a09-4613-bf6d-833aae3743f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6674">パスポート＃</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6674">パスポート＃</span></span>
