## <a name="japan-residence-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6681">日本住宅电话卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6681">Japan residence card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6682">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6682">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6683">12个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6683">12 letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6684">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6684">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6685">12个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6685">12 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6686">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6686">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6687">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6687">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6688">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6688">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6690">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6690">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6693">正则表达式 Regex_jp_residence_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6693">The regular expression Regex_jp_residence_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6694">找到 Keyword_jp_residence_card_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6694">A keyword from Keyword_jp_residence_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!--Japan Residence Card Number-->
-<Entity id="ac36fef2-a289-4e2c-bb48-b02366e89fc0" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Regex_jp_residence_card_number"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_residence_card_number"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6699">住宅卡片#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6699">Residence card #</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6700">在留カード番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6700">在留カード番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6703">日本居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6703">Japan resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6704">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6704">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6705">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6705">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6706">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6706">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6707">11 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6707">11 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6708">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6708">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6709">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6709">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6710">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6710">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6712">函数 Func_jp_resident_registration_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6712">The function Func_jp_resident_registration_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6713">找到 Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6713">A keyword from Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="01c1209b-6389-4faf-a5f8-3f7e13899652" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_resident_registration_number" />
        <Match idRef ="Keyword_jp_resident_registration_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6722">外国人登録証明書番号</span></span>

## <a name="japan-social-insurance-number-sin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6726">日本社会保险号 (SIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6726">Japan social insurance number (SIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6727">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6727">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6728">7-12 个数字 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6728">7-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6729">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6729">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6730">7-12 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6730">7-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6731">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6731">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6732">连字符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6732">a hyphen (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6733">六位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6733">six digits OR</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6734">7-12 个连续的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6734">7-12 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6735">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6735">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6736">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6736">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6737">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6737">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6738">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6738">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6739">函数 Func_jp_sin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6739">The function Func_jp_sin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6740">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6740">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6741">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6741">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6742">函数 Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6742">The function Func_jp_sin_pre_1997 finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6743">找到 Keyword_jp_sin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6743">A keyword from Keyword_jp_sin is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Japan Social Insurance Number -->
<Entity id="c840e719-0896-45bb-84fd-1ed5c95e45ff" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_jp_sin_pre_1997" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_jp_sin" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6753">雇用保険番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6753">雇用保険番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6759">介護保険被保険者番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6759">介護保険被保険者番号</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6760">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6760">健康保険被保険者整理番号</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6763">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6763">厚生年金被保険者整理番号</span></span>


## <a name="latvia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6764">拉脱维亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6764">Latvia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6765">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6765">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6767">三个字母后跟六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6767">three letters followed by six digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6769">三个字母和六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6769">three letters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6770">三个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6770">three letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6771">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6771">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6772">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6772">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6773">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6773">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6774">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6774">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6775">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6775">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6776">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6776">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6777">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6777">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="ec996de0-30f2-46b1-b192-4d2ff8805fa7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6901">vadītāja apliecība</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6901">vadītāja apliecība</span></span>

## <a name="latvia-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6902">拉脱维亚个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6902">Latvia personal code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6903">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6903">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6904">11个数字和一个可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6904">11 digits and an optional hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6905">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6905">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6906">旧格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6906">Old format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6907">11个数字和一个连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6907">11 digits and a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6908">与出生日期 (DDMMYY) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6908">six digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMYY)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6909">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6909">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6910">一个数字，对应于19世纪的出生世纪 ( "0"，"1" 表示20世纪，"2" 表示21世纪) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6910">one digit that corresponds to the century of birth ("0" for 19th century, "1" for 20th century, and "2" for 21st century)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6911">四个数字，随机生成</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6911">four digits, randomly generated</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6912">新格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6912">New format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6913">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6913">11 digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6914">两位数 "32"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6914">Two digits "32"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6915">九个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6915">Nine digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6916">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6916">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6917">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6917">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6918">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6918">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6919">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6919">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6920">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6920">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6921">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6921">A keyword from  `Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6922">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6922">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6923">函数  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` 或正则表达式 `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6923">The function  `Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card` or the regex `Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Latvia Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="03fcf763-27c2-49ed-9422-2641c6c895c9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_national_id_card_new_format" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>

```

## <a name="latvia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6986">拉脱维亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6986">Latvia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-6987">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6987">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6988">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6988">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6989">两个字母或数字后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6989">two letters or digits followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6990">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6990">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6991">两个字母或数字，后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6991">two letters or digits followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6992">两个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6992">two digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6993">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6993">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6994">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6994">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6995">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6995">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-6996">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6996">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-6997">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6997">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6998">正则表达式  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6998">The regular expression  `Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-6999">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-6999">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_latvia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7019">立陶宛驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7019">Lithuania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7020">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7020">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7021">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7021">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7022">8位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7022">eight digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7023">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7023">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7024">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7024">eight digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7025">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7025">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7026">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7026">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7027">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7027">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7028">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7028">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7029">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7029">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7030">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7030">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="86f7628b-e0f4-4dc3-9fbc-e4300e4c7d78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7031">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7031">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7032">Keywords_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7032">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="lithuania-personal-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7155">立陶宛个人代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7155">Lithuania personal code</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7156">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7156">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7157">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7157">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7158">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7158">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7159">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7159">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7160">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7160">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7161">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7161">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7162">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7162">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7163">11个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7163">11 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7164">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7164">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7165">11个数字，不含空格和分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7165">11 digits without spaces and delimiters:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7166">一种数字 (1-6) ，对应于个人的性别和出生世纪</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7166">one digit (1-6) that corresponds to the person's gender and century of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7167">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7167">six digits that correspond to birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7168">与出生日期的序列号对应的三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7168">three digits that correspond to the serial number of the date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7169">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7169">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7170">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7170">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7171">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7171">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7172">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7172">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7173">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7173">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7174">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7174">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7175">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7175">A keyword from  `Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7176">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7176">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7177">函数  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7177">The function  `Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Lithuania Personal Code -->
      <Entity id="cd6d3786-8ec3-4524-a2cf-1e0095379171" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_lithuania_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="lithuania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7212">立陶宛护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7212">Lithuania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7213">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7213">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7215">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7215">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7217">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7217">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7218">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7218">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7219">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7219">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7220">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7220">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7221">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7221">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7222">正则表达式  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7222">The regular expression  `Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7223">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7223">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_lithuania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7240">Luxemburg 驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7240">Luxemburg driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7241">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7241">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7242">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7242">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7243">6位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7243">six digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7244">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7244">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7245">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7245">six digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7247">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7247">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7250">正则表达式  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7250">The regular expression  `Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7251">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7251">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="89daf717-1544-4860-9a2e-fc9166dd8852" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7373">fahrerlaubnis</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7373">fahrerlaubnis</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7375">Luxemburg (自然个人的国家标识号码) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7375">Luxemburg national identification number (natural persons)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7376">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7376">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7377">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7377">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7378">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7378">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7379">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7379">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7380">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7380">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7381">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7381">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7382">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7382">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7383">13个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7383">13 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7384">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7384">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7385">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7385">13 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7386">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7386">11 digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7387">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7387">two check digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7388">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7388">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7389">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7389">yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7390">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7390">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7391">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7391">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7392">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7392">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7393">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7393">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7394">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7394">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7395">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7395">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 


```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="aaf661ed-29ec-426d-8bf9-880cad298ebb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="luxemburg-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7418">Luxemburg 护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7418">Luxemburg passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7419">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7419">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7420">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7420">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7421">八个数字或字母不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7421">eight digits or letters with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7422">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7422">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7423">八个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7423">eight digits or letters (not case sensitive)</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7424">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7424">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7425">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7425">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7426">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7426">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7427">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7427">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7428">正则表达式  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7428">The regular expression  `Regex_nation_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7429">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7429">A keyword from  `Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_nation_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keywords_nation_eu_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7431">Keywords_nation_eu_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7432">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7432">passport number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7434">护照号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7434">passport no</span></span>

## <a name="luxemburg-national-identification-number-non-natural-persons"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7436">Luxemburg 国内标识号 (非自然个人) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7436">Luxemburg national identification number (non natural persons)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7437">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7437">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7438">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7438">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7439">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7439">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7440">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7440">11 digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7441">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7441">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7442">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7442">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7443">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7443">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7444">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7444">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7445">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7445">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7446">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7446">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7447">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7447">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7448">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7448">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7449">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7449">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7450">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7450">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7451">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7451">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7452">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7452">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7453">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7453">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7454">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7454">A keyword from  `Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7455">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7455">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7456">函数  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7456">The function  `Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Luxemburg National Identification Number (Non-natural persons) -->
      <Entity id="84bffa3a-d805-4788-a613-b1e4df3804cf" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_luxemburg_eu_tax_file_number_non_natural" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_luxemburg_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malaysia-identification-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7496">马来西亚标识卡号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7496">Malaysia identification card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7497">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7497">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7498">12 个数字（包含可选连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7498">12 digits containing optional hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7499">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7499">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7500">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7500">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7501">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7501">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7502">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7502">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7503">两个字母的出生位置代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7503">two-letter place-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7504">短划线 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7504">a dash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7505">三个随机数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7505">three random digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7506">一位数的性别代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7506">one-digit gender code</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7507">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7507">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7508">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7508">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7509">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7509">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7510">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7510">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7511">正则表达式 Regex_malaysia_id_card_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7511">The regular expression Regex_malaysia_id_card_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7512">找到 Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7512">A keyword from Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Malaysia ID Card Number -->
</Entity>
      <Entity id="7f0e921c-9677-435b-aba2-bb8f1013c749" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
            <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malaysia_id_card_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7513">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7513">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_malaysia_id_card_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7514">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7514">Keyword_malaysia_id_card_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7515">数字应用程序卡</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7515">digital application card</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7516">i/c</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7516">i/c</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7517">i/c 否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7517">i/c no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7518">ic</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7518">ic</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7519">内部公司编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7519">ic no</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7520">id card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7520">id card</span></span>

## <a name="malta-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7539">马耳他驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7539">Malta driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7540">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7540">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7541">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7541">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7542">两个字符与指定模式中的六个数字的组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7542">Combination of two characters and six digits in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7543">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7543">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7544">两个字符和六个数字的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7544">combination of two characters and six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7545">两个字符 (数字或字母，而不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7545">two characters (digits or letters, not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7546">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7546">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7547">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7547">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7548">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7548">a space (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7549">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7549">three digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7550">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7550">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7551">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7551">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7552">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7552">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7553">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7553">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7554">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7554">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7555">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7555">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="a3bdaa4a-8371-4735-8fa5-56ee0fb4afc4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-identity-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7679">马耳他身份卡片号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7679">Malta identity card number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7680">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7680">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7681">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7681">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7682">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7682">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7683">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7683">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7684">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7684">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7685">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7685">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7686">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7686">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7687">七位数字后跟一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7687">seven digits followed by one letter</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7688">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7688">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7689">七位数字后跟一个字母：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7689">seven digits followed by one letter:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7690">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7690">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7691">在 "M、G、A、P、L、H、B、Z" (不区分大小写中的一个字母) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7691">one letter in "M, G, A, P, L, H, B, Z" (case insensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7692">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7692">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7693">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7693">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7694">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7694">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7695">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7695">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7696">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7696">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7697">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7697">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7698">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7698">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7699">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7699">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Identity Card Number -->
      <Entity id="854b36b3-a388-4ac8-a4ec-677c2b5e4356" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7716">马耳他护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7716">Malta passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7717">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7717">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7718">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7718">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7719">七位数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7719">seven digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7720">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7720">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7721">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7721">seven digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7722">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7722">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7723">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7723">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7724">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7724">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7725">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7725">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7726">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7726">The regular expression  `Regex_malta_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7727">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7727">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="malta-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7744">马耳他税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7744">Malta tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7745">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7745">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7746">对于马耳他 nationals：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7746">For Maltese nationals:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7747">七个数字和指定模式中的一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7747">seven digits and one letter in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7748">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7748">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7749">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7749">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7750">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7750">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7751">马耳他 nationals：七位数和一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7751">Maltese nationals: seven digits and one letter</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7752">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7752">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7753">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7753">one letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7754">非马耳他语 nationals 和马耳他语实体：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7754">Non-Maltese nationals and Maltese entities: nine digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7755">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7755">nine digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7756">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7756">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7757">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7757">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7758">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7758">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7759">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7759">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7760">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7760">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number`  or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7761">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7761">A keyword from  `Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7762">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7762">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7763">正则表达式  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7763">The regex  `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number` or `Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Malta Tax ID Number -->
      <Entity id="ec830c63-65f4-45d0-9d8c-910dc8334b20" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_malta_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_malta_eu_tax_file_number_non_maltese_national" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-citizens-service-bsn-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7796">荷兰公民服务 (BSN) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7796">Netherlands citizen's service (BSN) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7797">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7797">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7798">8-9 个数字，包含可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7798">eight-nine digits containing optional spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7799">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7799">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7800">8-9 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7800">eight-nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7801">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7801">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7802">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7802">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7803">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7803">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7804">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7804">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7805">双三位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7805">two-three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7806">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7806">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7807">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7807">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7808">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7808">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7809">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7809">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7810">函数 Func_netherlands_bsn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7810">The function Func_netherlands_bsn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7811">找到 Keyword_netherlands_bsn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7811">A keyword from Keyword_netherlands_bsn is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7812">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7812">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Citizen's Service (BSN) Number -->
      <Entity id="c5f54253-ef7e-44f6-a578-440ed67e946d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_bsn" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7836">荷兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7836">Netherlands driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7837">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7837">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7838">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7838">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7839">10个数字，无空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7839">ten digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7840">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7840">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7841">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7841">ten digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7842">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7842">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7843">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7843">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7844">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7844">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7845">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7845">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7846">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7846">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7847">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7847">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="6247fbea-ab80-4be5-8233-308b7c031401" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7975">荷兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7975">Netherlands passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7976">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7976">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7977">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7977">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7978">九个字母或数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7978">nine letters or digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7979">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7979">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7980">九个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7980">nine letters or digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7981">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7981">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7982">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7982">not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7983">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7983">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-7984">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7985">正则表达式  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7985">The regular expression  `Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7986">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7986">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_passport_number" />
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="netherlands-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-7996">荷兰税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7996">Netherlands tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-7997">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7997">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7998">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7998">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-7999">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-7999">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8000">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8000">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8001">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8001">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8002">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8002">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8003">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8003">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8004">9个数字，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8004">nine digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8005">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8005">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8006">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8006">nine digits</span></span> 
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8007">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8007">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8008">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8008">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8009">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8009">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8010">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8010">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8011">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8011">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8012">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8012">A keyword from  `Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8013">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8013">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8014">函数  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8014">The function  `Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="01f42a64-eba7-4892-a67b-398237e4ade2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
