## <a name="netherlands-value-added-tax-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8052">荷兰增值税号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8052">Netherlands value added tax number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8053">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8053">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8054">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8054">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8055">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8055">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8056">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8056">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8057">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8057">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8058">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8058">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8059">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8059">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8060">14个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8060">14 character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8061">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8061">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8062">14个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8062">14-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8063">N 或 n</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8063">N or n</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8064">L 或 l</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8064">L or l</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8065">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8065">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8066">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8066">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8067">可选空格、点号或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8067">optional space, dot or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8068">B 或 b</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8068">B or b</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8069">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8069">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8070">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8071">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8071">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8072">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8073">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8074">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8074">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8075">找到 Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8075">A keyword from Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8076">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8077">函数 Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8077">The function Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Netherlands Value Added Tax Number -->
      <Entity id="4f320d9b-4972-41ae-b337-88d499bb1ade" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_netherlands_value_added_tax_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8086">新西兰银行帐号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8086">New Zealand bank account number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8087">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8087">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8088">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8088">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8089">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8089">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8090">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8090">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8091">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8091">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8092">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8092">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8093">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8093">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8094">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8094">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8095">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8095">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8096">14到16个带可选分隔符的数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8096">14 to 16 digit pattern with optional delimiter:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8097">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8097">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8098">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8098">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8099">三到四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8099">three to four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8100">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8100">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8101">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8101">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8102">一个可选连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8102">an optional hyphen or space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8103">两到三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8103">two to three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8104">一个选项连字符或空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8104">an options hyphen or space</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8106">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8106">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8109">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8109">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8110">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8110">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_bank_account_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8111">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8112">函数 Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8112">The function Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Bank Account Number -->
      <Entity id="1a97fc2b-dd2f-48f1-bc4e-2ddf25813956" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zFealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_bank_account_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8113">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8113">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8120">新西兰驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8120">New Zealand driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8121">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8121">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8122">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8122">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8123">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8123">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8124">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8124">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8125">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8125">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8126">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8126">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8127">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8127">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8128">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8128">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8129">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8129">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8130">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8130">eight character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8131">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8131">two letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8132">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8132">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8133">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8133">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8134">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8134">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8135">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8135">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8136">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8136">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8137">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8137">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8138">找到 Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8138">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8139">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8139">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8140">函数 Func_newzealand_driver_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8140">The function Func_newzealand_driver_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Driver License Number -->
      <Entity id="1924b377-d287-49c9-a737-cfe7a8a2615a" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_driver_license_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="new-zealand-inland-revenue-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8207">新西兰 inland 收入编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8207">New Zealand inland revenue number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8208">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8208">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8209">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8209">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8210">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8210">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8211">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8211">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8212">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8212">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8213">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8213">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8214">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8214">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8215">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8215">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8216">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8216">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8217">八个或9个带可选分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8217">eight or nine digits with optional delimiters</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8218">两个或三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8218">two or three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8219">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8219">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8220">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8220">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8221">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8221">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8222">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8222">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8223">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8223">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8224">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8224">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8225">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8225">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8226">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8226">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8227">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8227">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8228">找到 Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8228">A keyword from Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8229">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8229">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8230">函数 Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8230">The function Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- New Zealand Inland Revenue Number -->
      <Entity id="dd0fe2bc-7bcf-455f-bac1-83b1e3eb25fd" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8231">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8231">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8232">Keyword_new_zealand_inland_revenue_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8233">ird。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8233">ird no.</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-ministry-of-health-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8239">新新西兰的运行状况号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8239">New Zealand ministry of health number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8240">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8240">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8241">三个字母、一个空格 (可选) 和四位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8241">three letters, a space (optional), and four digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8242">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8242">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8243">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 除 "I" 和 "O"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8243">three letters (not case sensitive) except 'I' and 'O'</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8244">空格 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8244">a space (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8245">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8245">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8246">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8246">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8247">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8247">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8248">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8248">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8249">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8250">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8250">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8251">找到 Keyword_nz_terms 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8251">A keyword from Keyword_nz_terms is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8252">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8252">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8253">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8253">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8254">函数 Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8254">The function Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8255">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8255">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- New Zealand Health Number -->
    <Entity id="2b71c1c8-d14e-4430-82dc-fd1ed6bf05c7" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_nz_terms" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_zealand_ministry_of_health_number" />
       </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8267">国家/地区运行状况索引 Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8267">National Health Index Id</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8268">国家运行状况索引#</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8268">National Health Index #</span></span>

## <a name="new-zealand-social-wlefare-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8269">新西兰社会 wlefare 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8269">New Zealand social wlefare number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8270">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8270">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8271">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8271">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8272">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8272">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8273">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8273">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8274">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8274">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8275">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8275">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8276">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8276">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8277">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8277">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8278">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8278">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8279">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8279">nine digits</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8280">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8280">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8281">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8281">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8282">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8282">three digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8283">可选连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8283">an optional hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8284">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8284">three digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8285">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8285">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8286">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8286">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8287">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8287">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8288">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8288">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8289">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8289">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8290">找到 Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8290">A keyword from Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8291">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8291">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8292">函数 Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8292">The function Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Newzealand Social Welfare Number -->
      <Entity id="20f3c48d-4ac1-4cd2-86bd-34ecc1826e9d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_newzealand_social_welfare_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="norway-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8300">挪威身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8300">Norway identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8301">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8301">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8302">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8302">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8303">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8303">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8304">11 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8304">11 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8305">6位数，格式为 DDMMYY，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8305">six digits in the format DDMMYY which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8306">三位数的个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8306">three-digit individual number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8307">两个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8307">two check digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8308">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8308">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8309">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8309">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8310">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8310">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8311">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8311">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8312">函数 Func_norway_id_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8312">The function Func_norway_id_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8313">找到 Keyword_norway_id_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8313">A keyword from Keyword_norway_id_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8314">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8314">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8315">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8315">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8316">函数 Func_norway_id_numbe 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8316">The function Func_norway_id_numbe finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8317">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8317">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Norway Identification Number -->
<Entity id="d4c8a798-e9f2-4bd3-9652-500d24080fc3" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_norway_id_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8318">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8318">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="philippines-unified-multi-purpose-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8326">菲律宾统一多用途标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8326">Philippines unified multi-purpose identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8327">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8327">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8328">12 个数字，通过连字符分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8328">12 digits separated by hyphens</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8329">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8329">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8330">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8330">12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8331">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8331">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8332">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8332">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8333">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8333">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8334">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8334">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8335">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8335">one digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8336">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8336">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8337">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8337">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8338">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8338">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8339">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8339">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8340">正则表达式 Regex_philippines_unified_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8340">The regular expression Regex_philippines_unified_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8341">找到 Keyword_philippines_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8341">A keyword from Keyword_philippines_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Philippines Unified Multi-Purpose ID number -->
<Entity id="019b39dd-8c25-4765-91a3-d9c6baf3c3b3" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_philippines_unified_id"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_philippines_id"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8342">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8342">Keywords</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8344">Unified Multi-Purpose ID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8345">UMID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8345">UMID</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8346">Identity Card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8346">Identity Card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8347">Pinag-isang Multi-Layunin ID</span></span>

## <a name="poland-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8348">波兰驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8348">Poland driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8349">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8349">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8350">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8350">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8351">14位数，包含2个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8351">14 digits containing 2 forward slashes</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8352">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8352">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8353">14位数和2正斜杠：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8353">14 digits and 2 forward slashes:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8354">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8354">five digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8355">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8355">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8356">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8356">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8357">一个正斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8357">a forward slash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8358">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8358">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8359">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8359">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8360">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8360">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8361">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8361">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8362">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8362">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8363">正则表达式  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8363">The regular expression  `Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8364">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8364">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Poland Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="24d51f99-ee9e-4060-a077-cae58cab1ee4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-identity-card"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8488">波兰恒等卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8488">Poland identity card</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8489">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8489">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8490">三个字母和六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8490">three letters and six digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8491">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8491">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8492">三个字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8492">three letters (not case sensitive) followed by six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8493">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8493">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8494">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8494">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8495">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8495">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8496">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8496">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8497">函数 Func_polish_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8497">The function Func_polish_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8498">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8498">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8499">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8499">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Identity Card-->
<Entity id="25E64989-ED5D-40CA-A939-6C14183BB7BF" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8501">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8501">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8507">Dowód Tożsamości</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8507">Dowód Tożsamości</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8508">dow.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8508">dow.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-8509">os.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8509">os.</span></span>

   
## <a name="poland-national-id-pesel"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8510">波兰国 ID (PESEL) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8510">Poland national ID (PESEL)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8511">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8511">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8512">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8512">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8513">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8513">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8514">表示出生日期的6个数字 YYMMDD 格式。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8514">6 digits representing date of birth in the format YYMMDD</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8515">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8515">4 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8516">1校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8516">1 check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8517">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8517">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8518">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8518">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8519">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8519">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8520">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8520">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8521">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8521">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8522">找到 Keyword_pesel_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8522">A keyword from Keyword_pesel_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8523">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8523">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8524">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8524">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8525">函数 Func_pesel_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8525">The function Func_pesel_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8526">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8526">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Poland National ID (PESEL) -->
      <Entity id="E3AAF206-4297-412F-9E06-BA8487E22456" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_pesel_identification_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="poland-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8538">波兰护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8538">Poland passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8539">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8539">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8540">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8540">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8541">两个字母和七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8541">two letters and seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8542">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8542">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8543">两个字母（不区分大小写）后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8543">Two letters (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8544">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8544">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8545">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8545">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8546">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8546">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8547">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8547">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8548">函数 Func_polish_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8548">The function Func_polish_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8549">找到 Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8549">A keyword from Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8550">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8550">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Poland Passport Number -->
<Entity id="03937FB5-D2B6-4487-B61F-0F8BFF7C3517" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_passport_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_polish_national_id_passport_number" />
      </Pattern>
</Entity>
</Version>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8551">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8551">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8552">Keyword_poland_national_id_passport_number</span></span>

## <a name="poland-regon-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8557">波兰 REGON 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8557">Poland REGON number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8558">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8558">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8559">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8559">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8560">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8560">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8561">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8561">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8562">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8562">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8563">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8563">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8564">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8564">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8565">9个数字或14个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8565">nine digit or 14 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8566">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8566">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8567">9个数字或14位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8567">nine digit or 14-digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8568">九位数字或</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8568">nine digits or</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8569">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8569">nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8570">号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8570">hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8571">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8571">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8572">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8572">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8573">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8573">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8574">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8574">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8575">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8575">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8576">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8576">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8577">找到 Keywords_polish_regon_number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8577">A keyword from Keywords_polish_regon_number is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8578">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8578">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8579">函数 Func_polish_regon_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8579">The function Func_polish_regon_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Polish REGON Number  -->
      <Entity id="fc87b421-f437-4f8b-b739-29a735ead0d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_polish_regon_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8580">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8580">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="poland-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8596">波兰纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8596">Poland tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8597">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8597">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8598">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8598">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8599">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8599">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8600">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8600">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8601">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8601">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8602">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8602">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8603">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8603">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8604">11个不带空格或分隔符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8604">11 digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8605">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8605">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8606">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8606">11 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8607">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8607">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8608">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8608">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8609">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8609">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8610">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8610">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8611">函数  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8611">The function  `Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8612">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8612">A keyword from  `Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
  
```xml
      <!-- Poland Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="1ff28b4d-40f2-49e9-b677-9606a88e2bca" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_poland_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-citizen-card-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8642">葡萄牙公民卡片号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8642">Portugal citizen card number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8643">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8643">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8644">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8644">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8645">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8645">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8646">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8646">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8647">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8647">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8648">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8648">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8649">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8649">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8650">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8650">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8651">正则表达式 Regex_portugal_citizen_card 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8651">The regular expression Regex_portugal_citizen_card finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8652">找到 Keyword_portugal_citizen_card 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8652">A keyword from Keyword_portugal_citizen_card is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Portugal Citizen Card Number -->
<Entity id="91a7ece2-add4-4986-9a15-c84544d81ecd" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_citizen_card"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_portugal_citizen_card"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8672">葡萄牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8672">Portugal driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8673">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8673">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8674">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8674">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8675">两个模式-两个字母后跟5-8 个包含特殊字符的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8675">two patterns - two letters followed by 5-8 digits with special characters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8676">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8676">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8677">模式1：带有特殊字符的两个字母后跟5/6：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8677">Pattern 1: Two letters followed by 5/6 with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8678">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8678">Two letters (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8679">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8679">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8680">五个或六个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8680">Five or Six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8681">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8681">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8682">一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8682">One digit</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8683">模式2：一个字母后跟6/8 个数字，带有特殊字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8683">Pattern 2: One letter followed by 6/8 digits with special characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8684">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8684">One letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8685">一个连字符 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8685">A hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8686">6或8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8686">Six or eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8687">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8687">A space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8688">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8688">One digit</span></span>

    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8689">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8689">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8690">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8690">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8691">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8691">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8692">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8692">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8693">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8693">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8694">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8694">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="977f1e5a-2c33-4bcc-b516-95bb275cff23" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8695">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8695">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keywords_eu_drivers_license_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8696">Keywords_eu_driver "s_license_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8696">Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number</span></span>

## <a name="portugal-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8826">葡萄牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8826">Portugal passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8827">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8827">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8828">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8828">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8829">一个字母后跟六个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8829">one letter followed by six digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8830">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8830">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8831">一个字母后跟六个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8831">one letter followed by six digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8832">一个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8832">one letter (not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8833">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8833">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8834">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8834">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8835">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8835">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8836">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8836">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8837">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8837">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8838">正则表达式  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8838">The regular expression  `Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8839">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8839">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="portugal-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8863">葡萄牙税号标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8863">Portugal tax identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8864">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8864">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8865">9个带可选空格的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8865">nine digits with optional spaces</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8866">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8866">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8867">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8867">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8868">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8868">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8869">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8869">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8870">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8870">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8871">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8871">3 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8873">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8873">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8875">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8875">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8876">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8876">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8877">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8877">A keyword from  `Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8878">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8878">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8879">函数  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8879">The function  `Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Portugal Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="65372402-3131-4f1e-9983-4439841d1f15" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_portugal_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8904">罗马尼亚驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8904">Romania driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-8905">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8905">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8906">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8906">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8907">一个字符后跟八个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8907">one character followed by eight digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8908">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8908">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8909">一个字符后跟八个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8909">one character followed by eight digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8910">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8910">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8911">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8911">eight digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8912">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8912">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8913">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8913">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-8914">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8914">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-8915">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8915">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8916">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8916">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-8917">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-8917">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="b5511ace-2fd8-4ae4-b6fc-c7c6e4689e3c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="romania-personal-numeric-code-cnp"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9045">罗马尼亚个人数字代码 (CNP) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9045">Romania personal numeric code (CNP)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9046">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9046">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9047">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9047">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9048">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9048">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9049">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9049">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9050">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9050">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9051">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9051">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9052">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9052">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9053">13位数，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9053">13 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9054">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9054">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9055">1-9 的1位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9055">1 digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9056">代表出生日期 (YYMMDD 的6个数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9056">6 digits representing date of birth (YYMMDD)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9057">2位数，可以为01-52 或99</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9057">2 digits which can be 01-52 or 99</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9058">4位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9058">4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9059">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9059">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9060">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9060">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9061">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9061">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9062">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9062">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9063">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9063">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9064">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9064">A keyword from  `Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9065">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9065">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9066">函数  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9066">The function  `Func_romania_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Romania Personal Numerical Code (CNP) -->
      <Entity id="eb5fa399-fe28-4c67-8188-d63a616ed89c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_romania_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
