## <a name="romania-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9117">罗马尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9117">Romania passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9118">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9118">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9119">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9119">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9120">八个或9个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9120">eight or nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9121">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9121">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9122">8或9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9122">eight or nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9123">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9123">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9124">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9124">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9125">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9125">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9126">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9126">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9127">正则表达式  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9127">The regular expression  `Regex_romania_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9128">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9128">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_romania_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9143">俄罗斯护照号码（国内）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9143">Russia passport number domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9144">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9144">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9145">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9145">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9146">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9146">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9147">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9147">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9148">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9148">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9149">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9149">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9150">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9150">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9151">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9151">ten digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9152">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9152">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9153">10位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9153">ten digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9154">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9154">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9155">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9155">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9156">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9156">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9157">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9157">an optional space</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9158">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9158">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9159">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9159">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9160">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9160">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9161">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9161">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9162">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9162">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9163">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9163">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9164">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9164">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number Domestic -->
      <Entity id="76ec2f5d-cedb-48e1-8070-1998794af445" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_Domestic" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="russia-passport-number-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9181">俄罗斯护照号码（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9181">Russia passport number international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9182">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9182">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9183">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9183">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9184">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9184">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9185">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9185">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9186">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9186">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9187">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9187">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9188">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9188">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9189">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9189">nine digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9190">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9190">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9191">9位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9191">nine digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9192">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9192">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9193">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9193">an optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9194">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9194">seven digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9195">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9195">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9196">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9196">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9197">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9197">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9198">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9198">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9199">正则表达式 Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9199">The regex Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9200">找到 Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9200">A keyword from Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Russian Passport Number International -->
      <Entity id="ac5f4878-75e4-4b82-af2d-02e13ea9f411" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Russian_Passport_Number_International" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Russian_Passport_Number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="saudi-arabia-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9217">沙特阿拉伯国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9217">Saudi Arabia National ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9218">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9218">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9219">10位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9219">ten digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9220">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9220">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9221">10个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9221">ten consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9222">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9222">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9223">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9223">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9224">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9224">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9225">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9225">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9226">正则表达式 Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9226">The regular expression Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9227">找到 Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9227">A keyword from Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Saudi Arabia National ID -->
<Entity id="8c5a0ba8-404a-41a3-8871-746aa21ee6c0" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_saudi_arabia_national_id" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="singapore-national-registration-identity-card-nric-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9234">新加坡国家注册标识卡片 (NRIC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9234">Singapore national registration identity card (NRIC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9235">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9235">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9236">九个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9236">nine letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9237">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9237">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9238">九个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9238">nine letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9239">字母 "F"、"G"、"S" 或 "T" (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9239">the letter "F", "G", "S", or "T" (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9240">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9240">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9241">字母校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9241">an alphabetic check digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9242">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9242">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9243">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9243">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9244">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9244">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9245">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9245">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9246">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9246">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9247">找到 Keyword_singapore_nric 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9247">A keyword from Keyword_singapore_nric is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9248">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9248">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9249">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9249">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9250">正则表达式 Regex_singapore_nric 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9250">The regular expression Regex_singapore_nric finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9251">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9251">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Singapore National Registration Identity Card (NRIC) Number -->
<Entity id="cead390a-dd83-4856-9751-fb6dc98c34da" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_singapore_nric"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9262">斯洛伐克驾照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9262">Slovakia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9263">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9263">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9264">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9264">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9265">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9265">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9266">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9266">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9267">一个字符后跟七个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9267">one character followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9268">一个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9268">one letter (not case-sensitive) or digit</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9269">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9269">seven digits</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9270">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9270">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9271">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9271">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9272">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9272">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9273">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9273">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9274">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9274">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9275">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9275">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="14240c22-b6de-4ce5-a90b-137f74252513" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovakia-personal-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9401">斯洛伐克个人号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9401">Slovakia personal number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9402">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9402">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9403">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9403">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9404">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9404">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9405">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9405">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9406">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9406">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9407">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9407">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9408">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9408">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9409">九或十个数字，包含可选反斜杠</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9409">nine or ten digits containing optional backslash</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9410">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9410">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9411">代表出生日期的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9411">6 digits representing date of birth</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9412">可选的斜杠 (/) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9412">optional slash (/)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9413">3位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9413">3 digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9414">1可选校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9414">1 optional check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9415">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9415">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9416">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9416">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9417">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9417">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9418">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9418">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9419">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9419">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9420">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9420">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9421">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9421">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9422">函数  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9422">The function  `Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovakia Personal Number -->
      <Entity id="951c26b7-3b35-4f73-924b-15dd599cb9ab" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovakia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
    </Version>
```

## <a name="slovakia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9469">斯洛伐克护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9469">Slovakia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9470">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9470">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9471">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9471">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9472">一个数字或字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9472">one digit or letter followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9473">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9473">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9474">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) 后跟七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9474">one digit or letter (not case sensitive) followed by seven digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9475">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9475">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9476">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9476">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9477">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9477">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9478">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9478">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9479">正则表达式  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9479">The regular expression  `Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9480">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9480">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovakia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9499">斯洛文尼亚驱动程序的许可证编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9499">Slovenia driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9500">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9500">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9501">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9501">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9502">9个数字，不带空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9502">nine digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9503">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9503">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9504">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9504">nine digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9505">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9505">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9506">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9506">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9507">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9507">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9508">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9508">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9509">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9509">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9510">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9510">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5bc089a-f2ee-433d-a6b1-5c253051d6f2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-unique-master-citizen-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9637">斯洛文尼亚唯一主公民号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9637">Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9638">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9638">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9639">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9639">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9640">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9640">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9641">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9641">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9642">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9642">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9643">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9643">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9644">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9644">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9645">13位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9645">13 digits without spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9646">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9646">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9647">指定模式中的13个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9647">13 digits in the specified pattern:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9648">与出生日期 (DDMMLLL) 的七位数，其中 "LLL" 对应于出生年份的后三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9648">seven digits that correspond to the birth date (DDMMLLL) where "LLL" corresponds to the last three digits of the birth year</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9649">两个数字，对应于出生区域 "50"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9649">two digits that correspond to the area of birth "50"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9650">三个数字，对应于出生在同一天的人的性别和序列号组合， (000-499 的男和500-999 的插孔) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9650">three digits that correspond to a combination of gender and serial number for persons born on the same day (000-499 for male and 500-999 for female)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9651">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9651">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9652">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9652">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9653">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9653">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9654">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9654">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9655">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9655">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9656">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9656">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9657">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9657">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9658">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9658">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9659">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9659">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Unique Master Citizen Number -->
      <Entity id="68948b27-803d-41e4-adf1-13e05eb541bb" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9687">斯洛文尼亚护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9687">Slovenia passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9688">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9688">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9689">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9689">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9690">两个字母后跟七个数字，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9690">two letters followed by seven digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9691">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9691">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9692">两个字母后跟七个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9692">two letters followed by seven digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9693">字母 "P"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9693">the letter "P"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9694">一个大写字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9694">one uppercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9695">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9695">seven digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9696">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9696">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9697">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9697">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9698">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9698">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9699">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9699">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9700">正则表达式  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9700">The regular expression  `Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9701">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9701">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="slovenia-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9721">斯洛文尼亚税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9721">Slovenia tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9722">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9722">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9723">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9723">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9724">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9724">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9725">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9725">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9726">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9726">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9727">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9727">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9728">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9728">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9729">8位数，不含空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9729">eight digits with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9730">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9730">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9731">一个从1-9 的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9731">one digit from 1-9</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9732">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9732">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9733">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9733">one check digit</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9734">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9734">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9735">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9735">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9736">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9736">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9737">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9737">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9738">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9738">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9739">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9739">A keyword from  `Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9740">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9740">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9741">函数  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9741">The function  `Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Slovenia Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="e47b071e-c352-4d70-8241-8c215ad65505" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_slovenia_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="south-africa-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9765">南非身份证号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9765">South Africa identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9766">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9766">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9767">13 个数字（可能包含空格）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9767">13 digits that may contain spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9768">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9768">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9769">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9769">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9770">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9770">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9771">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9771">four digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9772">一位公民指示器</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9772">a single-digit citizenship indicator</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9773">数字 "8" 或 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9773">the digit "8" or "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9774">一个数字，是校验和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9774">one digit which is a checksum digit</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9775">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9775">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9776">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9776">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9777">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9777">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9778">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9778">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9779">函数 Func_south_africa_identification_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9779">The function Func_south_africa_identification_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9780">找到 Keyword_south_africa_identification_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9780">A keyword from Keyword_south_africa_identification_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9781">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9781">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Africa Identification Number -->
<Entity id="e2adf7cb-8ea6-4048-a2ed-d89eb65f2780" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_africa_identification_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_africa_identification_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="south-korea-resident-registration-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9787">韩国居民注册号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9787">South Korea resident registration number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9788">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9788">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9789">13 个数字（包含连字符）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9789">13 digits containing a hyphen</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9790">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9790">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9791">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9791">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9792">6位数，格式为 YYMMDD，表示出生日期</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9792">six digits in the format YYMMDD which are the date of birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9793">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9793">a hyphen</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9794">由世纪和性别确定的一位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9794">one digit determined by the century and gender</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9795">四位数的出生区域代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9795">four-digit region-of-birth code</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9796">一种用于区分上述号码相同的人员的数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9796">one digit used to differentiate people for whom the preceding numbers are identical</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9797">校验位。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9797">a check digit.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9798">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9798">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9799">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9799">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9800">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9800">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9801">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9801">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9802">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9802">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9803">找到 Keyword_south_korea_resident_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9803">A keyword from Keyword_south_korea_resident_number is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9804">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9804">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9805">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9805">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9806">函数 Func_south_korea_resident_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9806">The function Func_south_korea_resident_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9807">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9807">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- South Korea Resident Registration Number -->
<Entity id="5b802e18-ba80-44c4-bc83-bf2ad36ae36a" recommendedConfidence="85" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Func_south_korea_resident_number"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9808">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9808">Keywords</span></span>
   
#### <a name="keyword_south_korea_resident_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9809">Keyword_south_korea_resident_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9810">National ID card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9810">National ID card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9811">Citizen's Registration Number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9812">Jumin deungnok beonho</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9813">RRN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9813">RRN</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9814">주민등록번호</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9814">주민등록번호</span></span>

## <a name="spain-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9815">西班牙驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9815">Spain driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9816">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9816">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9817">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9817">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9818">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9818">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9819">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9819">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9820">8位数，后跟一个字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9820">eight digits followed by one character:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9821">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9821">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9822">一个数字或字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9822">one digit or letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9823">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9823">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9824">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9824">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9825">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9825">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9826">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9826">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9827">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9827">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9828">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9828">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9829">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9829">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9830">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9830">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="d5a82922-b501-4f40-8868-341321146aa2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-dni"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9964">西班牙 DNI</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9964">Spain DNI</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-9965">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9965">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9966">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9966">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9967">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9967">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9968">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9968">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9969">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9969">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9970">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9970">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9971">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9971">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9972">8位数，后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9972">eight digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9973">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9973">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9974">七位数字后跟一个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9974">seven digits followed by one character</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9975">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9975">eight digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9976">可选空格或连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9976">An optional space or hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9977">一个检查信函 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9977">one check letter (not case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9978">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9978">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9979">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9979">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-9980">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9980">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9981">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9981">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9982">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9982">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9983">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9983">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card"` is found.</span></span> 

<span data-ttu-id="68240-9984">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9984">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-9985">函数  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-9985">The function  `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 

    
```xml
      <!-- Spain DNI -->
      <Entity id="8e6251b9-47b4-40e8-a42b-0f80876be192" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_national_id_card" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_foreigner" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="spain-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10009">西班牙护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10009">Spain passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10010">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟护照号敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10010">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10011">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10011">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10012">八个或九个字符的字母和数字的组合，不带空格或分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10012">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers with no spaces or delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10013">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10013">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10014">字母和数字的八个或九个字符的组合：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10014">an eight- or nine-character combination of letters and numbers:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10015">两位数字或字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10015">two digits or letters</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10016">一个数字或字母 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10016">one digit or letter (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10017">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10017">six digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10018">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10018">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10019">不适用</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10019">Not applicable</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10020">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10020">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10021">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10021">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10022">正则表达式  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10022">The regular expression  `Regex_spain_eu_passport_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10023">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10023">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_passport_number_common` or `Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU Passport Number -->
<Entity id="21883626-6245-4f3d-9b61-5cbb43e625ee" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_passport_number_common" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_passport_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10024">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10024">Keywords</span></span>

## <a name="spain-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10049"> (SSN) 的西班牙社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10049">Spain social security number (SSN)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10050">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟社会保险号或等效 ID 敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10050">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10051">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10051">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10052">11-12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10052">11-12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10053">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10053">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10054">11-12 位数：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10054">11-12 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10055">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10055">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10056">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10056">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10057">七到八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10057">seven to eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10058">可选) 的正斜杠 (</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10058">a forward slash (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10059">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10059">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10060">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10060">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10061">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10061">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10062">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10062">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10063">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10063">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10064">函数 Func_spanish_social_security_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10064">The function Func_spanish_social_security_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10065">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10065">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Spain SSN -->
<Entity id="5df987c0-8eae-4bce-ace7-b316347f3070" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_spanish_social_security_number" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10066">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10066">Keywords</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10067">无</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10067">None</span></span>

## <a name="spain-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10068">西班牙纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10068">Spain tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10069">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10069">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10070">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10070">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10071">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10071">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10072">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10072">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10073">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10073">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10074">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10074">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10075">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10075">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10076">七个或8个数字以及指定模式中的一个或两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10076">seven or eight digits and one or two letters in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10077">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10077">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10078">具有西班牙国家标识卡片的西班牙语自然人：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10078">Spanish Natural Persons with a Spain National Identity Card:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10079">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10079">eight digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10080">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10080">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10081">不包含西班牙国家的非居民 Spaniards 国家标识卡片</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10081">Non-resident Spaniards without a Spain National Identity Card</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10082">一个大写的字母 "L" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10082">one uppercase letter "L" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10083">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10083">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10084">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10084">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10085">在没有西班牙国内身份证的14年年龄下的居民 Spaniards：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10085">Resident Spaniards under the age of 14 years without a Spain National Identity Card :</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10086">一个大写的字母 "K" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10086">one uppercase letter"K" (case-sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10087">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10087">seven digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10088">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10088">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span>
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10089">带有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10089">Foreigners with a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10090">一个大写的字母，为 "X"、"Y" 或 "Z" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10090">one uppercase letter that is "X", "Y", or "Z" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10091">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10091">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10092">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10092">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10093">没有 Foreigner 标识号的 Foreigners</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10093">Foreigners without a Foreigner's Identification Number</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10094">一个大写字母为 "M" (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10094">one uppercase letter that is "M" (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10095">七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10095">seven digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10096">一个大写字母 (区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10096">one uppercase letter (case-sensitive)</span></span> 
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10097">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10097">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10098">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10098">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10099">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10099">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10100">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10100">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10101">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10101">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10102">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10102">A keyword from  `Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10103">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10103">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10104">函数  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` 或 `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10104">The function  `Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number` or `Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Spain Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="10f0d113-b0e1-47dc-872a-a4f45b9376a3" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_spain_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_spain_eu_DL_and_NI_number_citizen" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sql-server-connection-string"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10135">SQL Server 连接字符串</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10135">SQL Server connection string</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10136">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10136">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10137">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"，后跟下面模式中所述的字符和字符串。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10137">The string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId" followed by the characters and strings outlined in the pattern below.</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10138">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10138">Pattern</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10139">字符串 "User Id"、"User ID"、"uid" 或 "UserId"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10139">the string "User Id", "User ID", "uid", or "UserId"</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10140">介于1-200 个字母、数字、符号、特殊字符或空格之间的任意组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10140">any combination of between 1-200 lower- or uppercase letters, digits, symbols, special characters, or spaces</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10141">字符串 "Password" 或 "pwd"，其中 "pwd" 不以小写字母开头</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10141">the string "Password" or "pwd" where "pwd" is not preceded by a lowercase letter</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10142">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10142">an equal sign (=)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10143">不是美元符号 ($) 的任何字符、百分比符号 (% ) 、大于符号 ( # A0) 、符号 ( @ ) 、引号 ( ") 、分号 (、) 、左大括号 ( [) 或左括号 ( {) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10143">any character that is not a dollar sign ($), percent symbol (%), greater than symbol (>), at symbol (@), quotation mark ("), semicolon (;), left brace([), or left bracket ({)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10144">7-128 个不是分号的字符的任意组合 (; ) 、正斜杠 (/) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10144">any combination of 7-128 characters that are not a semicolon (;), forward slash (/), or quotation mark (")</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10145">分号 (; ) 或引号 ( ") </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10145">a semicolon (;) or quotation mark (")</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10146">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10146">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10147">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10147">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10148">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10148">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10149">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10149">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10150">正则表达式 CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10150">The regular expression CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10151">找 **不** 到 CEP_GlobalFilter 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10151">A keyword from CEP_GlobalFilter is **not** found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10152">正则表达式 **CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10152">The regular expression CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10153">正则表达式 **CEP_CommonExampleKeywords 不会找到与** 该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10153">The regular expression CEP_CommonExampleKeywords does **not** find content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```sql
<!---SQL Server Connection String>
<Entity id="e76b6205-d3cb-46f2-bd63-c90153f2f97d" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="CEP_Regex_SQLServerConnectionString" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="CEP_GlobalFilter" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_PasswordPlaceHolder" />
            <Match idRef="CEP_CommonExampleKeywords" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10163">密码或密码后跟：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10163">Password or pwd followed by:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10164">等号 (=) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10164">Equal sign (=)</span></span>

    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10166">1-200 个字符的任意组合，这些字符为大写或小写字母、数字、星号 ( \* ) 、连字符 ( ) 、下划线 (_) 或空白字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10166">Any combination of 1-200 characters that are upper- or lowercase letters, digits, an asterisk (\*), hyphen (-), underline (_), or whitespace character</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10167">大于符号 ( # A0) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10167">Greater than symbol (>)</span></span>
