## <a name="sweden-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10181">瑞典驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10181">Sweden driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10182">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟驾驶执照号码的敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10182">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10183">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10183">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10184">10个数字，包含连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10184">ten digits containing a hyphen</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10185">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10185">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10186">10位数，包含连字符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10186">ten digits containing a hyphen:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10187">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10187">six digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10188">连字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10188">a hyphen</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10189">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10189">four digits</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10190">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10190">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10191">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10191">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10192">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10192">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10193">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10193">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10194">正则表达式  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10194">The regular expression  `Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10195">找到或中的关键字  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10195">A keyword from  `Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number` or `Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Driver's License Number -->
      <Entity id="70088720-90dd-47f5-805e-5525f3567391" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          <Any minMatches="1">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_eu_driver's_license_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_driver's_license_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-national-id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10328">瑞典国家 ID</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10328">Sweden national ID</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10329">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10329">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10330">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10330">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10331">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10331">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10332">10或12个数字和一个可选分隔符：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10332">ten or 12 digits and an optional delimiter:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10333">两个数字 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10333">two digits (optional)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10334">采用日期格式 YYMMDD 的六位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10334">Six digits in date format YYMMDD</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10335">"-" 或 "+" 的分隔符 (可选) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10335">delimiter of "-" or "+" (optional)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10336">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10336">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10337">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10337">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10338">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10338">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10339">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10339">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10340">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10340">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10341">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10341">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10342">找到了 from 关键字 `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier`</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10342">A keyword from `Keywords_swedish_national_identifier` is found</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10343">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10343">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10344">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10344">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10345">函数 `Func_swedish_national_identifier` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10345">The function `Func_swedish_national_identifier` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10346">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10346">The checksum passes.</span></span>


```xml
    <!-- Sweden National ID -->
    <Entity id="f69aaf40-79be-4fac-8f05-fd1910d272c8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
        <Match idRef="Keywords_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_swedish_national_identifier" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10365">瑞典护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10365">Sweden passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10366">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10366">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10367">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10367">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10368">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10368">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10369">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10369">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10370">八个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10370">eight consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10371">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10371">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10372">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10372">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10373">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10373">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10374">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10374">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10375">正则表达式 Regex_sweden_passport_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10375">the regular expression Regex_sweden_passport_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10376">满足以下条件之一：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10376">one of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10377">找到 Keyword_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10377">a keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10378">找到 Keyword_sweden_passport 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10378">a keyword from Keyword_sweden_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Sweden Passport Number -->
<Entity id="ba4e7456-55a9-4d89-9140-c33673553526" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_sweden_passport_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_sweden_passport" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-social-security-number-or-equivalent-identification"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10409">瑞典社会保险号或等效标识</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10409">Sweden social security number or equivalent identification</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10410">此敏感信息类型实体仅适用于欧盟社会保险号码或等效 ID 敏感信息类型。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10410">This sensitive information type entity is only available in the EU Social Security Number or Equivalent ID sensitive information type.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10411">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10411">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10412">12个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10412">12 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10413">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10413">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10414">12 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10414">12 digits:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10415">对应于出生日期 (YYYYMMDD) 的8位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10415">eight digits that correspond to the birth date (YYYYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10416">与序列号对应的三个数字，其中：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10416">three digits that correspond to a serial number where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10417">序列号中的最后一个数字指示在为 "男" 分配一个奇数号码时的性别，以及一个 "女" 的偶数号码。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10417">the last digit in the serial number indicates gender by the assignment of an odd number for male and an even number for female</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10418">最多1990，将序列号 corresponded 分配给那些号码的持有者出生或 (的县。如果在 1947) 之前出生，则根据纳税记录在年1月1日的) 使用特殊代码 (通常为9的 immigrants 的1947第七位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10418">up to 1990, the assignment of serial number corresponded to the county where the bearer of the number was born or (if born before 1947) where he/she had been living, according to tax records, on January 1, 1947, with a special code (usually 9 as the 7th digit) for immigrants</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10419">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10419">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10420">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10420">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10421">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10421">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10422">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10422">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10423">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10423">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10424">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10424">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10425">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10425">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10426">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10426">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10427">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10427">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
 <!-- EU SSN or Equivalent Number -->
<Entity id="d24e32a4-c0bb-4ba8-899d-6303b95742d9" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern> 
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_ssn_or_equivalent" />
        </Pattern>      
</Entity>
```

## <a name="sweden-tax-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10443">瑞典纳税标识号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10443">Sweden tax identification number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10444">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10444">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10445">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10445">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10446">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10446">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10447">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10447">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10448">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10448">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10449">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10449">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10450">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10450">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10451">10个数字和指定模式中的符号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10451">ten digits and a symbol in the specified pattern</span></span>
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10452">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10452">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10453">10个数字和一个符号：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10453">ten digits and a symbol:</span></span>
  
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10454">与出生日期 (YYMMDD) 的6个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10454">six digits that correspond to the birth date (YYMMDD)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10455">正号或减号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10455">a plus sign or minus sign</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10456">在以下位置使标识号唯一的三个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10456">three digits that make the identification number unique where:</span></span> 
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10457">对于在1990之前发出的号码，第七和第八位数字标识出生的县或外部人</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10457">for numbers issued before 1990, the seventh and eighth digit identify the county of birth or foreign-born people</span></span>
  - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10458">第九个位置中的数字表示为奇数或甚至是女的性别</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10458">the digit in the ninth position indicates gender by either odd for male or even for female</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10459">一个校验位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10459">one check digit</span></span>
    
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10460">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10460">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10461">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10461">Yes</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10462">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10462">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10463">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10463">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10464">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10464">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10465">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10465">A keyword from  `Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10466">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10466">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10467">函数  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10467">The function  `Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- Sweden Tax Identification Number -->
      <Entity id="139acba0-a5bc-4fbb-876d-f7a493ae8a40" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_sweden_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_telephone_number" />
            <Match idRef="Keywords_sweden_eu_mobile_number" />
          </Any>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="swift-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10493">SWIFT 代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10493">SWIFT code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10494">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10494">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10495">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10495">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10496">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10496">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10497">四个字母后跟5-31 个字母或数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10497">four letters followed by 5-31 letters or digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10498">四个字母的银行代码 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10498">four-letter bank code (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10499">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10499">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10500">4-28 个字母或数字（基本银行账号 (BBAN)）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10500">4-28 letters or digits (the Basic Bank Account Number (BBAN))</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10501">一个可选空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10501">an optional space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10502">BBAN 的余数 (1 到3个字母或数字) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10502">one to three letters or digits (remainder of the BBAN)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10503">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10503">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10504">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10504">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10505">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10505">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10506">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10506">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10507">正则表达式 Regex_swift 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10507">The regular expression Regex_swift finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10508">找到 Keyword_swift 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10508">A keyword from Keyword_swift is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="cb2ab58c-9cb8-4c81-baf8-a4e106791df4" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_swift" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_swift" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="switzerland-ssn-ahv-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10545">瑞士 SSN AHV 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10545">Switzerland SSN AHV number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10546">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10546">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10547">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10547">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10548">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10548">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10549">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10549">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10550">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10550">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10551">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10551">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10552">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10552">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10553">13位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10553">13 digit number</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10554">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10554">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10555">13位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10555">13 digit number:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10556">三位数-756</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10556">three digits - 756</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10557">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10557">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10558">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10558">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10559">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10559">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10560">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10560">four digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10561">一个可选的点</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10561">an optional dot</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10562">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10562">two digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10563">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10563">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10564">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10564">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10565">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10565">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10566">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10566">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10567">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10567">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10568">找到 Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10568">A keyword from Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10569">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10569">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10570">函数 Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10570">The function Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Swiss SSN AHV Number -->
      <Entity id="277cfa4b-6eaa-4a1b-9492-099dec849971" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_swiss_social_security_number_ahv" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10591">台湾国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10591">Taiwan national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10592">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10592">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10593">一个英文)  (，后跟9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10593">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10594">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10594">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10595">一个英文字母 (，后跟9个数字) ：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10595">one letter (in English) followed by nine digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10596">一个英文字母 (，不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10596">one letter (in English, not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10597">数字 "1" 或 "2"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10597">the digit "1" or "2"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10598">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10598">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10599">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10599">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10600">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10600">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10601">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10601">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10602">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10602">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10603">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10603">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10604">找到 Keyword_taiwanese_national_id 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10604">A keyword from Keyword_taiwanese_national_id is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10605">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10605">The checksum passes.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10606">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10606">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10607">函数 Func_taiwanese_national_id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10607">The function Func_taiwanese_national_id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10608">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10608">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwanese National ID -->
<Entity id="4C7BFC34-8DD1-421D-8FB7-6C6182C2AF03" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwanese_national_id" />
      </Pattern>
       <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
         <IdMatch idRef="Func_taiwanese_national_id" />
       </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="taiwan-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10625">台湾护照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10625">Taiwan passport number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10626">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10626">Format</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10627">生物识别护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10627">biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10628">不带生物的护照号码：9个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10628">non-biometric passport number: nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10629">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10629">Pattern</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10630">生物识别护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10630">biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10631">字符 "3"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10631">the character "3"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10632">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10632">eight digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10633">不带生物的护照号码：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10633">non-biometric passport number:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10634">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10634">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10635">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10635">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10636">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10636">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10637">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10637">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10638">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10638">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10639">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10639">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10640">找到 Keyword_taiwan_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10640">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Passport Number -->
<Entity id="e7251cb4-4c2c-41df-963e-924eb3dae04a" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_passport"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_passport"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_passport"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10642">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10642">Keyword_taiwan_passport</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10644">Passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10644">Passport number</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10645">Passport no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10645">Passport no</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10646">Passport Num</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10646">Passport Num</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10647">Passport #</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10647">Passport #</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10648">护照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10648">护照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10649">中華民國護照</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10649">中華民國護照</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10650">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10650">Zhōnghuá Mínguó hùzhào</span></span>
   
## <a name="taiwan-resident-certificate-arctarc-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10651">台湾居民证书 (ARC/TARC) 号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10651">Taiwan resident certificate (ARC/TARC) number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10652">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10652">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10653">10个字母和数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10653">ten letters and digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10654">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10654">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10655">10个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10655">ten letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10656">两个字母 (不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10656">two letters (not case sensitive)</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10657">八位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10657">eight digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10658">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10658">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10659">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10659">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10660">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10660">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10661">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10661">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10662">正则表达式 Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10662">The regular expression Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10663">找到 Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10663">A keyword from Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Taiwan Resident Certificate (ARC/TARC) -->
<Entity id="48269fec-05ea-46ea-b326-f5623a58c6e9" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
  <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
     <IdMatch idRef="Regex_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
     <Match idRef="Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"/>
  </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10664">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10664">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10665">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10665">Keyword_taiwan_resident_certificate</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10666">Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10666">Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10667">Resident Cert</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10667">Resident Cert</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10668">Resident Cert.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10668">Resident Cert.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10669">Identification card</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10669">Identification card</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10670">Alien Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10670">Alien Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10671">ARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10671">ARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10672">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10672">Taiwan Area Resident Certificate</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10673">TARC</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10673">TARC</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10674">居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10674">居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10675">外僑居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10675">外僑居留證</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10676">台灣地區居留證</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10676">台灣地區居留證</span></span> 

## <a name="thai-population-identification-code"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10677">泰语填充标识代码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10677">Thai population identification code</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10678">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10678">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10679">13 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10679">13 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10680">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10680">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10681">13 个数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10681">13 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10682">第一个数字不是零或九</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10682">first digit is not zero  or nine</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10683">12 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10683">12 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10684">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10684">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10685">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10685">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10686">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10686">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10687">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10687">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10688">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10688">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10689">找到 Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10689">A keyword from Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10690">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10690">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10691">函数 Func_Thai_Citizen_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10691">The function Func_Thai_Citizen_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Thai Citizen ID -->
-<Entity id="44ca9e86-ead7-4c5d-884a-e2eaa401515e" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Thai_Citizen_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10692">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10692">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_thai_citizen_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10693">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10693">Keyword_thai_citizen_Id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10694">ID Number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10694">ID Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10695">标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10695">Identification Number</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10696">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10696">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10697">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10697">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10698">บัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10698">บัตรประชาชน</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10699">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10699">รหัสบัตรประชาชน</span></span>
  
## <a name="turkish-national-identification-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10700">土耳其国家标识号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10700">Turkish national identification number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10701">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10701">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10702">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10702">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10703">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10703">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10704">11 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10704">11 digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10705">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10705">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10706">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10706">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10707">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10707">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10708">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10708">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10709">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10709">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10710">找到 Keyword_Turkish_National_Id 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10710">A keyword from Keyword_Turkish_National_Id is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10711">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10711">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10712">函数 Func_Turkish_National_Id 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10712">The function Func_Turkish_National_Id finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- Turkish National Identity -->
-<Entity id="fb621f20-3876-4cfc-acec-8c8e73ca32c7" recommendedConfidence="75" patternsProximity="300">
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
      <Match idRef="Keyword_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
   -<Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
      <IdMatch idRef="Func_Turkish_National_Id"/>
   </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

### <a name="keywords"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10713">关键字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10713">Keywords</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_turkish_national_id"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10714">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10714">Keyword_turkish_national_id</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10716">TC Kimlik numarası</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10716">TC Kimlik numarası</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10718">Vatandaşlık no</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10718">Vatandaşlık no</span></span>

## <a name="uk-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10719">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10719">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-10720">驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10720">driver's license number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10721">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟驱动程序的 "敏感信息类型" 中，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10721">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU Driver's License Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10722">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10722">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10723">特定格式的 18 个字母和数字组合</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10723">Combination of 18 letters and digits in the specified format</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10724">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10724">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10725">18 个字母和数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10725">18 letters and digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10726">5个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10726">five letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10727">一位</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10727">one digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10728">日期格式 MMDDY 中的五个数字。出生日期 (第七个字符将增加50如果驱动程序是女，即51到62而不是01到 12) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10728">five digits in the date format MMDDY for date of birth (7th character is incremented by 50 if driver is female, i.e. 51 to 62 instead of 01 to 12)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10729">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 或数字 "9" 代替一个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10729">two letters (not case sensitive) or the digit "9" in place of a letter</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10730">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10730">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10731">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10731">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10732">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10732">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10733">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10733">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10734">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10734">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10735">函数 Func_uk_drivers_license 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10735">The function Func_uk_drivers_license finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10736">找到 Keyword_uk_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10736">A keyword from Keyword_uk_drivers_license is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10737">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10737">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Driver's License Number -->
<Entity id="f93de4be-d94c-40df-a8be-461738047551" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_drivers_license" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10753">driving licence</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10753">driving licence</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10754">dual control car</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10754">dual control car</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-electoral-roll-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10755">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10755">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-10756">electoral 卷号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10756">electoral roll number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10757">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10757">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10758">两个字母后跟1-4 位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10758">two letters followed by 1-4 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10759">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10759">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10760">两个字母 (不区分大小写) 后接1-4 个号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10760">two letters (not case sensitive) followed by 1-4 numbers</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10761">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10761">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10762">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10762">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10763">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10763">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10764">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10764">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10765">正则表达式 Regex_uk_electoral 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10765">The regular expression Regex_uk_electoral finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10766">找到 Keyword_uk_electoral 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10766">A keyword from Keyword_uk_electoral is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. Electoral Number -->
<Entity id="a3eea206-dc0c-4f06-9e22-aa1be3059963" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_uk_electoral" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_electoral" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_electoral"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10768">Keyword_uk_electoral</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10768">Keyword_uk_electoral</span></span>

## <a name="uk-national-health-service-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10773">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10773">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-10774">国家/地区运行状况服务号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10774">national health service number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10775">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10775">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10776">10-17 个数字，通过空格分隔 </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10776">10-17 digits separated by spaces</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10777">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10777">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10778">10-17 位数字：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10778">10-17 digits:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10779">3个或10个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10779">either three or ten digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10780">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10780">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10781">三个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10781">three digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10782">一个空格</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10782">a space</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10783">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10783">four digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10784">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10784">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10785">是</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10785">Yes</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10786">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10786">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10787">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10787">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10788">函数 Func_uk_nhs_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10788">The function Func_uk_nhs_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10789">下列其中一项为真：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10789">One of the following is true:</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10790">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10790">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10791">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10791">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number1 is found.</span></span>
    - <span data-ttu-id="68240-10792">找到 Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10792">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10793">校验和通过。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10793">The checksum passes.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.K. NHS Number -->
<Entity id="3192014e-2a16-44e9-aa69-4b20375c9a78" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nhs_number" />
        <Any minMatches="1">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number1" />
          <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10795">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10795">Keyword_uk_nhs_number</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10796">national health service</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10796">national health service</span></span>

#### <a name="keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10805">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10805">Keyword_uk_nhs_number_dob</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10806">GP</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10806">GP</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10807">DOB</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10807">DOB</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10808">D. B。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10808">D.O.B</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10809">Date of Birth</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10809">Date of Birth</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10810">Birth Date</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10810">Birth Date</span></span> 
   
## <a name="uk-national-insurance-number-nino"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10811">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10811">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-10812">国内保险号 (NINO) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10812">national insurance number (NINO)</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10813">此敏感信息类型实体包含在欧盟国家/地区 Identificaiton 号敏感信息类型中，可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10813">This sensitive information type entity is included in the EU National Identificaiton Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10814">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10814">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10815">由空格或短划线分隔的七个字符或九个字符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10815">seven characters or nine characters separated by spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10816">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10816">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10817">两种可能的模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10817">two possible patterns:</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10818"> (有效 NINOs 的两个字母仅使用此前缀中的特定字符，此格式将对此进行验证;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10818">two letters (valid NINOs use only certain characters in this prefix, which this pattern validates; not case sensitive)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10819">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10819">six digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10820">"A"、"B"、"C" 或 "d" (类似于前缀，后缀中只允许有某些字符;不区分大小写) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10820">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D' (like the prefix, only certain characters are allowed in the suffix; not case sensitive)</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10821">OR</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10821">OR</span></span>

- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10822">两个字母</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10822">two letters</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10823">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10823">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10824">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10824">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10825">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10825">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10826">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10826">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10827">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10827">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10828">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10828">two digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10829">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10829">a space or dash</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10830">要么是 "A"、"B"、"C"，要么 ' d '</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10830">either 'A', 'B', 'C', or 'D'</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10831">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10831">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10832">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10832">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10833">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10833">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10834">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10834">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10835">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10835">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10836">找到 Keyword_uk_nino 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10836">A keyword from Keyword_uk_nino is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10837">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10837">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10838">函数 Func_uk_nino 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10838">The function Func_uk_nino finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.K. NINO -->
    <Entity id="16c07343-c26f-49d2-a987-3daf717e94cc" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75" relaxProximity="true">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_nino" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="uk-unique-taxpayer-reference-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10860">U.K.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10860">U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-10861">唯一的纳税人参考号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10861">Unique Taxpayer Reference Number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-10862">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10862">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10863">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10863">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10864">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10864">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10865">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10865">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10866">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10866">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10867">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10867">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10868">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10868">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10869">10个数字，不含空格和分隔符</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10869">10 digits without spaces and delimiters</span></span>
 
  
### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10870">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10870">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10871">10 个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10871">10 digits</span></span>
  
### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10872">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10872">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10873">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10873">No</span></span>
  
### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10874">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10874">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10875">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10875">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10876">函数  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10876">The function  `Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number` finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10877">找到了中的关键字  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` 。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10877">A keyword from  `Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number` is found.</span></span> 
    
```xml
      <!-- U.K. Unique Taxpayer Reference Number -->
      <Entity id="ad4a8116-0db8-439a-b545-6d967642f0ec" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="85">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
          <IdMatch idRef="Func_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
          <Match idRef="Keywords_uk_eu_tax_file_number" />
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-bank-account-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10897">美国银行帐户编号</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10897">U.S. bank account number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10898">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10898">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10899">6-17 位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10899">6-17 digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10900">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10900">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10901">6-17 连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10901">6-17 consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10902">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10902">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10903">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10903">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10904">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10904">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10905">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10905">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10906">正则表达式 Regex_usa_bank_account_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10906">The regular expression Regex_usa_bank_account_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10907">找到 Keyword_usa_Bank_Account 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10907">A keyword from Keyword_usa_Bank_Account is found.</span></span>

```xml
<!-- U.S. Bank Account Number -->
<Entity id="a2ce32a8-f935-4bb6-8e96-2a5157672e2c" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_usa_bank_account_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_usa_Bank_Account" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="us-drivers-license-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10937">美国驾驶执照号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10937">U.S. driver's license number</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10938">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10938">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10939">取决于州</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10939">Depends on the state</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10940">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10940">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10941">取决于状态-例如，纽约：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10941">depends on the state -- for example, New York:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10942">与 ddd ddd ddd 相匹配的9个数字的格式将会匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10942">nine digits formatted like ddd ddd ddd will match.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10943">9个数字（如 ddddddddd）将不匹配。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10943">nine digits like ddddddddd will not match.</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10944">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10944">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10945">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10945">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-10946">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10946">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10947">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10947">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10948">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10948">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10949">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10949">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10950">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10950">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-10951">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10951">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10952">函数 Func_new_york_drivers_license_number 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10952">The function Func_new_york_drivers_license_number finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10953">找到 Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10953">A keyword from Keyword_[state_name]_drivers_license_name is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10954">找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10954">A keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations is found.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-10955">未找到 Keyword_us_drivers_license 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-10955">No keyword from Keyword_us_drivers_license is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="dfeb356f-61cd-459e-bf0f-7c6d28b458c6 patternsProximity="300">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
    </Pattern>
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_new_york_drivers_license_number" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_new_york_drivers_license_name" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license_abbreviations" />
        <Any minMatches="0" maxMatches="0">
          <Match idRef="Keyword_us_drivers_license" />
        </Any>
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```
