## <a name="us-individual-taxpayer-identification-number-itin"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11053">美国单个纳税人标识号 (ITIN) </span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11053">U.S. individual taxpayer identification number (ITIN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11054">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11054">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11055">九个数字，以 "9" 开头，并包含 "7" 或 "8" 作为第四个数字，可以选择使用空格或短划线进行格式设置</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11055">nine digits that start with a "9" and contain a "7" or "8" as the fourth digit, optionally formatted with spaces or dashes</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11056">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11056">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11057">格式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11057">formatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11058">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11058">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11059">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11059">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11060">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11060">a space or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11061">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11061">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11062">一个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11062">a digit</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11063">空格或短划线</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11063">a space, or dash</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11064">四位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11064">four digits</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11065">纯</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11065">unformatted:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11066">数字 "9"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11066">the digit "9"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11067">两位数</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11067">two digits</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11068">"7" 或 "8"</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11068">a "7" or "8"</span></span> 
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11069">五个数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11069">five digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11070">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11070">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11071">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11071">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11072">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11072">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11073">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11073">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11074">函数 Func_formatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11074">The function Func_formatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11075">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11075">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11076">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11076">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11077">函数 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11077">The function Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11078">找到 Keyword_itin 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11078">A keyword from Keyword_itin is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11079">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11079">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11080">函数 Func_formatted_itin 或 Func_unformatted_itin 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11080">The function Func_formatted_itin or Func_unformatted_itin finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>

```xml
    <!-- U.S. Individual Taxpayer Identification Number (ITIN) -->
    <Entity id="e55e2a32-f92d-4985-a35d-a0b269eb687b" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_formatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_itin" />
      </Pattern>
    </Entity>
```

## <a name="us-social-security-number-ssn"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11095"> (SSN) 的美国社会安全号码</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11095">U.S. social security number (SSN)</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11096">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11096">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11097">9个数字，可以是格式化或无格式的模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11097">nine digits, which may be in a formatted or unformatted pattern</span></span>

> [!NOTE]
> <span data-ttu-id="68240-11098">如果在 2011 年中旬前发布，则 SSN 具有强格式，即数字的某部分必须介于某个有效的范围中（但是没有校验和）。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11098">If issued before mid-2011, an SSN has strong formatting where certain parts of the number must fall within certain ranges to be valid (but there's no checksum).</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11099">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11099">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11100">四个函数在四种不同的模式中查找 Ssn：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11100">four functions look for SSNs in four different patterns:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11101">Func_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前使用短划线或空格格式化的强格式的 SSN（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11101">Func_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn 查找具有 2011 年以前未格式化为 9 个连续数字的强格式的 SSN (ddddddddd)</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11102">Func_unformatted_ssn finds SSNs with pre-2011 strong formatting that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后使用短划线或空格（ddd-dd-dddd 或 ddd dd dddd）格式化的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11103">Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are formatted with dashes or spaces (ddd-dd-dddd OR ddd dd dddd)</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 查找 2011 年后未格式化为 9 个连续数字 (ddddddddd) 的 SSN</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11104">Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds post-2011 SSNs that are unformatted as nine consecutive digits (ddddddddd)</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11105">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11105">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11106">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11106">No</span></span>


### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11107">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11107">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11108">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 85% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11108">A DLP policy is 85% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11109">函数 Func_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11109">The function Func_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11110">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11110">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11111">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11111">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11112">函数 Func_unformatted_ssn 查找与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11112">The function Func_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11113">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11113">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11114">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 65% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11114">A DLP policy is 65% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11115">函数 Func_randomized_formatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11115">The function Func_randomized_formatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11116">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11116">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11117">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 55% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11117">A DLP policy is 55% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11118">函数 Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11118">The function Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11119">找到 Keyword_ssn 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11119">A keyword from Keyword_ssn is found.</span></span>


```xml
<!-- U.S. Social Security Number (SSN) -->
  <Entity id="a44669fe-0d48-453d-a9b1-2cc83f2cba77" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="85">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="65">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_formatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
      <Pattern confidenceLevel="55">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_randomized_unformatted_ssn" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_ssn" />
      </Pattern>
  </Entity>
```

## <a name="us--uk-passport-number"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11134">美国/英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11134">U.S. / U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-11135">passport number</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11135">passport number</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-11136">英国</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11136">The U.K.</span></span> <span data-ttu-id="68240-11137">护照号敏感信息类型实体在欧盟护照号敏感信息类型中可用，并可用作独立的敏感信息类型实体。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11137">passport number sensitive information type entity is available in the EU Passport Number sensitive information type and is available as a stand alone sensitive information type entity.</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11138">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11138">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11139">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11139">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11140">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11140">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11141">九个连续数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11141">nine consecutive digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11142">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11142">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11143">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11143">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11144">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11144">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11145">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11145">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11146">函数 Func_usa_uk_passport 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11146">The function Func_usa_uk_passport finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11147">找到 Keyword_passport 中的一个关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11147">A keyword from Keyword_passport is found.</span></span>

```xml
<Entity id="178ec42a-18b4-47cc-85c7-d62c92fd67f8" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
    <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Func_usa_uk_passport" />
        <Match idRef="Keyword_passport" />
    </Pattern>
</Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-domestic"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11168">乌克兰护照国内</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11168">Ukraine passport domestic</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-11169">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11169">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11170">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11170">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11171">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11171">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11172">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11172">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11173">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11173">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11174">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11174">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11175">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11175">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11176">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11176">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11177">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11177">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11178">九位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11178">nine digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11179">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11179">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11180">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11180">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11181">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11181">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11182">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11182">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11183">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11183">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11184">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11184">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport Domestic -->
      <Entity id="1817a540-221f-4459-9202-3bd78b81d803" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
        <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_Domestic"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```

## <a name="ukraine-passport-international"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11193">乌克兰护照（国际）</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11193">Ukraine passport international</span></span>
<span data-ttu-id="68240-11194">此敏感信息类型仅可用于以下内容：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11194">This sensitive information type is only available for use in:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11195">数据丢失防护策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11195">data loss prevention policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11196">通信合规性策略</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11196">communication compliance policies</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11197">信息治理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11197">information governance</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11198">记录管理</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11198">records management</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11199">Microsoft 云应用安全</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11199">Microsoft cloud app security</span></span>

### <a name="format"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11200">Format</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11200">Format</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11201">八个字符的字母数字模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11201">eight-character alphanumeric pattern</span></span>

### <a name="pattern"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11202">模式</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11202">Pattern</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11203">八个字符的字母数字模式：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11203">eight-character alphanumeric pattern:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11204">两个字母或数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11204">two letters or digits</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11205">6位数字</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11205">six digits</span></span>

### <a name="checksum"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11206">校验和</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11206">Checksum</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11207">否</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11207">No</span></span>

### <a name="definition"></a><span data-ttu-id="68240-11208">定义</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11208">Definition</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="68240-11209">在 300 个字符的相似度内，如果出现以下情况，DLP 策略 75% 确信它检测到这种类型的敏感信息：</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11209">A DLP policy is 75% confident that it's detected this type of sensitive information if, within a proximity of 300 characters:</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11210">正则表达式 Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International 找到与该模式匹配的内容。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11210">The regex Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International finds content that matches the pattern.</span></span>
- <span data-ttu-id="68240-11211">找到 Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International 中的关键字。</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="68240-11211">A keyword from Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International is found.</span></span>

```xml
      <!-- Ukraine Passport International -->
      <Entity id="cfbe032d-22e0-4f28-ab68-d66e9641f1e2" patternsProximity="300" recommendedConfidence="75">
        <Pattern confidenceLevel="75">
          <IdMatch idRef="Regex_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
          <Match idRef="Keyword_Ukraine_Passport_International"/>
        </Pattern>
      </Entity>
```
